name: Attack Order
effect: High Critical. Ranged.
description: The user calls a swarm of young Combee from the honeycomb under this Pokémon. The coordinated attack is as strong as the commander.

name: Bug Bite
effect: If the Target Pokémon is holding a berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.
description: The Pokémon nibbles its foe, if it finds something tasty it will eat it in an instant. It may try to eat almost anything.

name: Bug Buzz
effect: Sound Based. Roll 1 Chance Dice to reduce foe's Sp. Defense by 1.
description: The Pokémon uses its wings or a part of its body to emit sound waves that harm and affect the target.

name: Defend Order
effect: User Increases its Defense and Sp. Defense by 1.
description: A swarm of bugs protect this Pokémon from damage.

name: Fell Stinger
effect: If the foe faints due to damage from this attack, Increase the user's Strength by 2.
description: The Pokémon stings the target, if the foe is too weakened to move it absorbs part of its power.

name: First Impression
effect: Priority 2. This move will only work the First Round the Pokémon is out in battle. From the second round on, it will fail automatically.
description: The Pokémon makes a dramatic entrance to the battlefield, taking the foe by surprise as to who its opponent really is.

name: Fury Cutter
effect: Successive Action (5 Attacks).
description: The Pokémon makes use of its claws or scythes to land as many hits as possible.

name: Heal Order
effect: Basic Heal.
description: The Pokémon commands its swarm to bring some healing honey.

name: Infestation
effect: Blocks. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The Pokémon summons a huge swarm of bugs to prevent the foe from escaping. Sometimes the sarm may take a while to arrive. The call extends for a hundred yards.

name: Leech Life
effect: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.
description: The user attacks a vital spot and sucks away the vitality of its foe.

name: Lunge
effect: Reduce foe's Strength.
description: The User charges against the foe at full force, not just to knock it down but to restrain it with its many limbs.

name: Megahorn
effect: Lethal Damage.
description: The Pokémon uses its strong horn(s) to pierce its foe and deal massive damage.

name: Pin Missile
effect: Ranged. Successive Action (5 Attacks).
description: The Pokémon showers its foe with stingers or spikes that pierce like needles.

name: Pollen Puff
effect: When this move is used against an ally, it will heal 1 HP instead of dealing damage.
description: The Pokémon creates a puff of pollen that explodes on the foe's face and gives them a terrible allergy. When consumed these puffs are sweet and very nutritious.

name: Powder
effect: Add 3 Dice of Damage to the next Fire Type attack that hits the target.
description: The foe is fully covered with a flammable powder, a source of fire might ignite it with explosive results.

name: Quiver Dance
effect: Increases Dexterity, Special and Sp. Defense by 1.
description: A mystical and beautiful dance that boosts a Pokémon's dexterity and focus.

name: Rage Powder
effect: Priority 2. During this Round, all damage moves from any foe must target the User.
description: The Pokémon releases an irritating powder that annoys and enrages foes into attacking.

name: Signal Beam
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.
description: The user emits an intense light that harms the foes and may leave them dazed like moths.

name: Silver Wind
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Increase User's Strength, Dexterity, Special, Defense, Sp. Defense by 1.
description: The Pokémon blows a beautiful silver colored wind that harms the foe, the performance may give the user a big confidence boost.

name: Spider Web
effect: Blocks.
description: The User quietly releases a web on the field. All foes will be trapped.

name: Steamroller
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
description: The user curls up and rolls at full speed to strike the foe. The may leave the target swatted on the ground.

name: Sticky Web
effect: Entry Hazard. Foe Pokémon that enter the battlefield get a Dexterity Reduction of 1. Pokémon with the Levitate ability and Flying Type Pokémon are immune to this effect.
description: The Pokémon quickly covers the arena with a stick web, newly arrived Foes will have trouble moving with ease.

name: String Shot
effect: Reduce the target's Dexterity by 1.
description: The user shoots a silk string that ties and limits the movement of its foe.

name: Struggle Bug
effect: Reduce the foe's Special by 1.
description: The Pokémon lays on its back and struggles with the foe, disrupting the foe's concentration.

name: Tail Glow
effect: Increase the User's Special by 3.
description: The User emits a strong light. This Pokémon will stare at its brightness to enter a trance.

name: Twineedle
effect: Multiple Action (2 Attacks). Ranged. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Poison the foe per hit. Ranged.
description: The Pokémon stabs the foe with its sting, claws or spikes infused with poison.

name: U-Turn
effect: The user switches out after dealing damage, the new Pokémon arrives to ready to fight on the next Round. Switcher Move.
description: The user strikes its foe, then quickly goes back to safety while another party Pokémon takes its place.

name: X-Scissor
description: The Pokémon uses its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors to cut through the foe.

name: Assurance
effect: If the User has already received damage from the target this Round. Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
description: The user retaliates against the foe, the rush of adrenaline allows it to hit harder.

name: Beat Up
effect: If the attack is successful, add 2 Dice of Damage for every ally Pokémon that spends an action to help the user perform this move, up to 3 allies may join.
description: The user calls other Pokémon to aid it in battle, together they give a beating to the foe.

name: Bite
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
description: The User lands a vicious bite that may leave an ugly bruise.

name: Brutal Swing
effect: Lethal.
description: The Pokémon starts attacking at full force with its claws, anyone unfortunate enough to be on its path will end up severely wounded.

name: Crunch
effect: Lethal. Roll 1 Chance Dice to reduce foe's Defense by 1.
description: The Pokémon uses its fangs to viciously tear whatever it is biting.

name: Dark Pulse
effect: Targets random foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
description: The Pokémon sends a wave of dark feelings that affect those who are most vulnerable, hurting the foe and leaving it unable to act.

name: Darkest Lariat
effect: Ignore the the foe's Attribute Increases that would decrease this Move's damage.
description: The User swings both of its arms against the target, there's no armor thick enough to stop the strike.

name: Embargo
effect: The target cannon use its held item, nor can its trainer use items on it.
description: The User quickly takes out the held item of a Pokémon. It also empties the bag of the trainer and forces everyone to stay away from their own properties. Evil doers master this Move.

name: Fake Tears
effect: Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense by 2.
description: The user stops battling and feigns to be crying, disrupting the foe's mood to battle and making it lower its guard.

name: Feint Attack
effect: Never Fail.
description: The Pokémon approaches the foe disarmingly then attacks suddenly without giving any time to react.

name: Flatter
effect: Reduce the foe's Special by 1. Confuse foe.
description: The user starts flattering and admiring its opponent, reducing its concentration and making it uncertain about what to do next.

name: Fling
effect: Ranged. Add up to 4 Dice to the Damage Pool, depending on the held item thrown. See P. 368 for more info.
description: The user takes its held item and throws it at the opponent. You may get it back after the fight.

name: Foul Play
effect: S.T.A.B of the user and Strength of the foe apply for this move's damage.
description: The user feints attacks then tricks the foe who ends up hurting itself.

name: Hone Claws
effect: Increase the User's Strength and Accuracy.
description: The Pokémon sharpens its claws to perform more precise attacks.

name: Knock Off
effect: The target Pokémon loses its held item.
description: The Pokémon makes a quick tackle that knocks off anything the foe was holding.

name: Memento
effect: The user faints. Reduce foe's Strength, Dexterity, Special, Defense and Sp. Defense by 2. Lasts for a whole scene.
description: The User unleashes all its remaining power to send a wave of hopeless thoughts to haunt the foe's mind and soul. The target will be left in grief.

name: Nasty Plot
effect: Increase the user's Special by 1.
description: The Pokémon starts plotting on how to defeat the enemy. Its evil laugh reveals the bad intentions.

name: Night Daze
effect: Roll 4 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Accuracy.
description: The user forms a pitch black wave that hurts the foe. This darkness may remain obstructing the target's vision.

name: Night Slash
effect: Lethal. High Critical.
description: The user quickly slashes through the target as soon as it gets the chance. The intent to end the target's life is frightening.

name: Parting Shot
effect: Reduce foe's Strength and Special. The user switches out, the new Pokémon arrives ready to fight on the next Round. Switcher Move.
description: The User threatens the foe, leaving it too scared to pursue the user or overwhelm the ally that just switched in the battlefield.

name: Payback
effect: Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool if the target already damaged you this Round.
description: The Pokémon tackles the target with hatred and vengeance.

name: Power Trip
effect: Add 1 Dice to the Damage Pool of this Move for every Attribute increase the user has. Up to 7 Dice may be added this way. (ie. the user has 2 increased points on Defense, add 2 Damage dice).
description: In the heat of the battle, the Pokémon gets carried away, relishing on its own power.

name: Punishment
effect: Add up to 7 Dice to the Damage Pool for every Increased Attribute the foe has. (ie. Foe has 1 Increased dice in Dexterity & Strength that equals +2 Dice on the Damage Pool of this attack).
description: User takes advantage of its foe's strengths to use them against it.

name: Pursuit
effect: If the foe is Switching Out or escaping, Add 2 Dice to the Damage Pool and Priority to this move.
description: The Pokémon chases the foe to deliver a final blow before it escapes.

name: Quash
effect: For the rest of the scene, the target will go last in the order of Initiative.
description: The user represses the foe with intimidation so it has to think twice before acting.

name: Snarl
effect: Sound Based. Reduce the foe's Special.
description: The Pokémon viciously snarls showing its teeth. Its menacing look will make the foe cower in fear.

name: Snatch
effect: Erash any Increase or Decrease on the foe's Traits, and place them on the User instead.
description: The User analyzes the advantages of the foe then makes them their own.

name: Sucker Punch
effect: Priority. If the target does not perform a damaging move, this attack will fail.
description: While the foe is preparing its attack, the user takes advantage and strikes.

name: Switcheroo
effect: User and Foe switch their Held Item. If only one Pokémon is holding an item it gives it away.
description: The user quickly switches the held items before the foe can realize what happened.

name: Taunt
effect: The target Pokémon can only perform Damaging Moves and Evasion actions for the next 4 Rounds.
description: The user mocks and teases the target to make it attack in a raging fury.

name: Thief
effect: The user steals the foe's Held Item.
description: The Pokémon strikes its foe and takes the opportunity to steal whatever the target was holding.

name: Throat Chop
effect: The target cannot use any "Sound Based" Move for the rest of the scene.
description: A heinous attack to a Pokémon's throat that will leave them unable to make a sound for hours.

name: Topsy-Turvy
effect: Any Decreases on the foe's Attributes become Increases and vice versa.
description: The user changes the nature of its target, bad things become good and good things become bad.

name: Torment
effect: The target cannot use the same Moves it used during the last Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The user torments and enrages the foe, making it unable to keep using its strategy.

name: Clanging Scales
effect: Sound Based. Reduce User's Defense.
description: The Pokémon rattles the scales of its armor creating a frightening noise in the area. Some of its scales fall off as a result, leaving some areas exposed.

name: Draco Meteor
effect: Lethal. Reduce User's Special.
description: The Pokémon calls a comet that falls from the sky to deal a brutal amount of damage. This feat demands a lot from the user.

name: Dragon Breath
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
description: The user lets out a mystical green breath that hinders the movement of anyone it touches.

name: Dragon Claw
description: The Pokémon uses its strong claws to deliver a fierce tearing blow.

name: Dragon Dance
effect: Increase the User's Strength and Dexterity.
description: The user performs a rigorous and mystical dance that boosts the fighting spirit and reflexes.

name: Dragon Hammer
description: The Pokémon swings its body as a hammer and leaves the for nailed to the cracked ground.

name: Dragon Pulse
description: The user opens its mouth and sends a powerful wave of energy.

name: Dragon Rage
effect: Set damage.
description: A dual colored flame that always leaves the same burn marks on everything it touches.

name: Dragon Rush
effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
description: The user charges rapidly against the foe. The strike may leave the target gasping for air.

name: Dragon Tail
effect: Low Priority. The target is hit and knocked back to its trainer, stunned. Forcing the trainer to send another Pokémon. In the wild the target is sent away. Switcher Move.
description: This powerful tail strike can knockback anyone up to 100 feet away!

name: Dual Chop
effect: Double Action.
description: The Pokémon strikes the foe with two brutal blows.

name: Outrage
effect: Rampage.
description: The user awakens their primal instinct as a dragon unleashes its uncontrollable fury, destroying everything in its path. After that, the Pokémon is left disoriented and confused.

name: Twister
effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foes.
description: The Pokémon lets out a spiral current that surrounds the foes. They can't move until they free themselves from this terrible whirlwind.

name: Charge
effect: Add 2 Dice to the Damage Pool to the next Electric Damaging move the user performs.
description: The user concentrates all the electricity in its body to be released.

name: Charge Beam
effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Special.
description: The Pokémon lets out an electric beam then uses the remaining charge to boost its power.

name: Discharge
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze those affected.
description: The user releases its stored electricity in all directions.

name: Eerie Impulse
effect: Reduce foe's Special by 2.
description: The user radiates electricity around itself, the foe will think twice about attacking.

name: Electric Terrain
effect: For the Next 4 Rounds all Electric Attacks will deal 1 Extra Dice of Damage. Anyone on the ground will from "Sleep" Status.
description: The user electrifies the terrain, making it impossible to get a good night's sleep on it.

name: Electrify
effect: The Damage from the next attack made by the target will be Electric Type.
description: The user hurls an electric projectile to the target, the foe is charged with electricity until it is released by the foe's next attack.

name: Electro Ball
effect: The user adds 1 Dice to the Damage Pool for every Dexterity point the User has that surpasses the foe's. Up to 4 Dice may be added.
description: The Pokémon creates a small electricity orb that is hurled at the target. If the user is faster, the impact will be bigger.

name: Electroweb
effect: Reduce Dexterity of those affected.
description: Shoots an electrified web at all foes to restrict their movement. Walking through this web can be painful.

name: Ion Deluge
effect: For the rest of the Scene, Normal Type Moves will deal damage as if they were Electric Type Moves.
description: The user amplifies all electrically charged particles in the environment. The results are shocking!

name: Magnet Rise
effect: For the Next 4 Rounds the User gains immunity against Ground Type Moves.
description: The Pokémon uses the magnetic field of the earth to repel itself from the ground, allowing it to float for a short period of time.

name: Magnetic Flux
effect: Increase the Defense and Sp. Defense of User and all its Electric and Steel Type Allies.
description: The Pokémon bends the magnetic field around itself, this also affects all allies who are sensible to it.

name: Nuzzle
effect: Paralyze the foe.
description: The Pokémon rubs its electrified cheeks against the foe, it looks very cute but it can be dangerous.

name: Parabolic Charge
effect: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt to one target, rounded down.
description: The Pokémon creates a diabolical plot to defeat the enemy. Its evil laugh reveals the bad intentions.

name: Shock Wave
effect: Never Fail.
description: The user quickly releases jolts of electricity that are too fast for many to react.

name: Spark
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
description: The user tackles the foe, releases a powerful spark on contact.

name: Thunder
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze foe. If performed under Sunny Weather, Reduce 2 dice from the Accuracy Roll. If performed under Rain Weather, Add 3 extra Dice to the Accuracy Roll.
description: The Pokémon commands a tremendous lightning to strike a specific point on the ground. It's quite dangerous.

name: Thunder Fang
effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
description: The user lands an electrified bite on the foe. The direct current may affect the foe greatly.

name: Thunder Punch
effect: Fist Based. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Paralyze foe.
description: An electrified punch to deal a shocking blow.

name: Thunder Shock
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
description: A small electric attack that shocks the foe any may leave it with muscular cramps. Some electric devices hit by this attack will malfunction.

name: Thunder Wave
effect: Paralyze the foe.
description: A tide of bright lightning streams from the floor onto the foe. The target's body will be cramped for hours.

name: Thunderbolt
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
description: A strong electric attack that shocks and harms the foe. It can destroy most kinds of electric equipment.

name: Volt Switch
effect: The user switches out after dealing damage, the new Pokémon arrives ready to fight on the next Round. Switcher Move.
description: The user quickly shoots an electricity jolt, then switches places with an awaiting Pokémon partner at the speed of lightning.

name: Volt Tackle
effect: Recoil. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Paralyze the Foe.
description: The user surrounds itself with big bolts of electricity, then it crashes against the foe.

name: Wild Charge
effect: Recoil.
description: The Pokémon surrounds itself with wild bolts of lightning, then tackles recklessly.

name: Zap Cannon
effect: Lethal. Paralyze the Foe.
description: The user hurls a dreadful bombardment of electric explosions. Anyone hit won't be able to move for a very long time.

name: Zing Zap
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.
description: The user hurls itself as a zig-zagging ball of electricity that explodes on contact, this leaves the for unable to move for a few seconds.

name: Aromatic Mist
effect: Increase one Ally's Defense and Sp. Defense.
description: The Pokémon showers an ally in a mist with revitalizing aroma.

name: Baby-Doll Eyes
effect: Priority. Reduce foe's Strength.
description: Before anyone acts in battle, the user looks at the foe with the cutest eyes.

name: Charm
effect: Reduce foe's Strength by 2.
description: The Pokémon uses a cute and harmless attitude to make the foe less wary and aggressive.

name: Crafty Shield
effect: Priority 3. The User and its Allies are protected from the effects of a Support Move. Shield.
description: The Pokémon creates a magic shield to protect everyone from the bad tricks a foe might have under its sleeve. Under this shield, everyone can see dishonesty and bad intentions.

name: Dazzling Gleam
description: The user shines like a powerful flash that hurts the eyes of everyone watching it.

name: Disarming Voice
effect: Sound Based. Never Fail.
description: With a charming and manipulative cry, the user deals emotional damage to its opponent. This move always makes the targets feel bad.

name: Draining Kiss
effect: The User restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.
description: The user sends a kiss with a flirty intention, the foe catches the kiss but it ends up draining the target's energy.

name: Fairy Lock
effect: Blocks. Last 1 Round.
description: The user moves as if locking a door. It takes a few moments before everyone realize they are not really trapped.

name: Fairy Wind
description: The Pokémon strikes with a wind covered in fairy dust. It causes itching.

name: Floral Healing
effect: Basic Heal. If performed over Grassy Terrain this move is a Complete Heal.
description: The user creates a flower crown that heals and relaxes its wearer. Under the right conditions this move also creates a flower patch around its target.

name: Flower Shield
effect: Increase the Defense of All Grass Type Pokémon on the field.
description: The Pokémon uses a mysterious power that causes flowers to bloom beneath every Grass Pokémon nearby. Flora in this field is more resilient and beautiful.

name: Misty Terrain
effect: Creatures standing on the battlefield won't be affected by Status Ailments. Dragon Type attacks won't add their Power to the Damage Pool. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The user surrounds the battlefield with a mystical mist that feels protective. Mythical Pokémon find something eerie about it.

name: Moonblast
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Special.
description: Summon power directly from the moon. The Pokémon blasts the foe with light.

name: Moonlight
effect: Basic Heal. If performed at night, this move becomes a Complete Heal.
description: The user gathers power from the light of the moon, the energy absorbed can heal most injuries.

name: Play Rough
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Strength.
description: The user and the foe start a playful wrestle, it soon escales into something not so pretty.

name: Sweet Kiss
effect: Confuse the foe.
description: The Pokémon moves towards the foe and plants a delicate kiss on its cheek, then leaves playfully. The foe struggles to know what it meant.

name: Arm Thrust
effect: Successive Actions.
description: The user quickly throws blows of open-palmed thrusts against the foe.

name: Aura Sphere
effect: Never Fail.
description: The user channels its aura and launches this power in the form of a sphere. The foe's aura is hit, leaving the target unscratched but deeply hurt.

name: Brick Break
effect: If a Barrier is in place on the foe's side (ie. Light Screen, Reflect) destroy the barrier and add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
description: The Pokémon uses its palm or claws to perform a one-armed chop that shatters even invisible barriers.

name: Bulk Up
effect: Increase the User's Strength and Defense.
description: The Pokémon shows its muscles with intimidating poses to look bigger and stronger.

name: Circle Throw
effect: Low Priority. The target is hit and knocked back to its trainer forcing it to send another Pokémon, the in the wild the target is sent away. Switcher Move.
description: The user throws the target 60 feet out of the battlefield.

name: Close Combat
effect: After dealing damage, Reduce the User's Defense and Sp. Defense.
description: The user attacks at a close distance to deal lots of damage. The foe is also close enough to attack.

name: Counter
effect: This move only works if the foe just used a Physical Attack. Roll the same Damage Pool as your foe's last attack and add 2 Damage Dice.
description: The user prepares to receive damage, the returns that same damage and more.

name: Cross Chop
effect: High Critical.
description: The user delivers a chop with its arms crossed trying to hit a weak spot.

name: Detect
effect: Priority 5. Shield Move. Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage Pool. Negate effects of Support Moves that target the user. Reduce to zero the set damage from a move the user would take.
description: The user detects the intentions of the attacker and acts out to minimize the damage.

name: Double Kick
effect: Double Action.
description: The user throws to powerful kicks.

name: Drain Punch
effect: Fist Based. The user restore HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.
description: The Pokémon strikes with a powerful punch. Through contact, its absorbs some vital energy.

name: Dynamic Punch
effect: Fist Based. Confuse the foe.
description: A punch that hits a small pressure point. It leaves the foe disoriented.

name: Final Gambit
effect: Ignore the foe's Defenses. The user faints after dealing damage.
description: The Pokémon uses its lasts strength into an all-or-nothing attack, after that, it faints.

name: Flying Press
effect: When Dealing damage with this move, it counts as if this move was also Flying Type.
description: The user flies towards the foe from the sky in pure Lucha Libre style.

name: Focus Blast
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Sp. Defense.
description: The user concentrates and releases a blast of energy.

name: Focus Punch
effect: Fist Based. Charge Move. The User will flinch if it gets hit before releasing this attack.
description: A brutal punch that requires calm and concentration.

name: Force Palm
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
description: A powerful open palm hit that knocks the foe away and may leave him unable to move.

name: Hammer Arm
effect: After dealing damage, Reduce user's Dexterity.
description: A mighty arm thrust that leaves the user quite tired.

name: High Jump Kick
effect: If Accuracy Roll is unsuccessful, deal 5 Dice of Damage to the User.
description: The user launches itself up and falls down with a brutal kick. It might hurt the user if it doesn't hit the target.

name: Jump Kick
effect: If Accuracy Roll is unsuccessful, deal 4 Dice of Damage to the User.
description: The Pokémon jumps and delivers a powerful kick. It might hurt the user if it doesn't hit the target.

name: Karate Chop
effect: High Critical.
description: A basic fighting chop that has been practiced and mastered.

name: Low Kick
effect: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every 50 kgs. of weight on the foe, up to +4 Extra Dice.
description: The user kicks the target making it fall, the bigger the foe the harder the fall.

name: Low Sweep
effect: Reduce Foe's Dexterity.
description: The Pokémon strikes the foe's legs, leaving it unable to walk normally or run.

name: Mach Punch
effect: Fist Based. Priority.
description: The user launches a Punch so quickly that it's barely seen.

name: Mat Block
effect: Shield. Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage Pool.
description: The Pokémon uses a mat or something similar as a shield.

name: Power-up Punch
effect: Fist Based. Increase User's Strength.
description: The Pokémon uses this punch to test the surface of an object. The user toughens up to deal better blows.

name: Quick Guard
effect: Shield Move. This move will only protect against Damaging Moves with "Priority" and surprise attacks. Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage Pool.
description: The user reacts instinctively and defends itself and its teammates, nullifying the effects of the fastest attacks.

name: Revenge
effect: If the User has already received damage this round, add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
description: The Pokémon fights ruthlessly and may retaliate fiercely against a foe that has hurt the User.

name: Reversal
effect: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every missing HP the User has. Up to 5 Dice may be added this Way.
description: The user gathers its mettle to block away the pain and focus only on hitting harder.

name: Rock Smash
effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Defense.
description: A powerful hit that can crush rocks. Used against a foe it is sure to leave an awful bruise and a crack on its armor.

name: Rolling Kick
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.
description: The user spins in the air landing an impressive kick that may daze the target.

name: Sacred Sword
effect: Ignore any Increases to the foe's Defense.
description: The use slashes its target with a mighty blade that no armor can stop.

name: Seismic Toss
effect: Add 1 Dice of Damage for 10 levels of the User (ie. The damage pool of a level 43 Pokémon is 4 Dice). Ignore Foe's Defenses.
description: The target gets launched up then falls face first into the ground, the stronger the user the higher the foe will be thrown.

name: Sky Uppercut
description: The user attacks with an uppercut, throwing the foe skyward with lots of force.

name: Storm Throw
effect: If the Accuracy Roll is successful this move becomes a Critical Hit.
description: The user impacts a weak spot with a powerful blow.

name: Submission
effect: Recoil.
description: The user recklessly struggles with the foe to pin it to the ground.

name: Superpower
effect: Lethal. Reduce User's Strength and Defense.
description: The Pokémon makes use of all its force to deliver a crushing strike to the foe, this demands a lot from the user.

name: Triple Kick
effect: Successive Actions. Add 1 Extra Dice to Damage Pool to the last kick performed.
description: The user throws three or more kicks, leaving the harder blow for the end.

name: Vacuum Wave
effect: Priority.
description: The user pulls the enemy closer using the power of its ki. This traction has a lot of strength and may break anything it pulls.

name: Vital Throw
effect: Low Priority. Never Fail.
description: The Pokémon awaits for the perfect moment to strike the foe.

name: Wake-Up Slap
effect: If the Foe is sleeping, Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool. The foe Wakes up afterwards.
description: A powerful slap that makes even the laziest Pokémon be well awake.

name: Blast Burn
effect: Lethal. Must Recharge.
description: The Pokémon uses all of its power to deliver an infernal blast to the foe. The user is left exhausted.

name: Blaze Kick
effect: High Critical. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 2 to the Foe.
description: The user throws a mighty kick engulfed in fire that may leave a bad looking burn.

name: Burn Up
effect: Lethal. After Damage is dealt, the user is no longer considered a Fire-Type for the rest of the day (if it's only type was Fire, it is now considered Typeless). Fire-type Moves won't add their Power to the Damage pool of this Pokémon for the rest of the day.
description: The User unleashes all of its might through a massive blast of raging fire. Although the damage is devastating the Pokémon is left unable to produce more fire for a at least a day.

name: Ember
effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Burn the Foe.
description: The user shoots a small flame against the target that may cause a first-degree burn.

name: Eruption
effect: Lethal. Reduce 1 Dice from the Damage Pool for every missing HP the User has. Up to 5 dice may be removed this way.
description: A fierce burst of lava coming from the user at full force charring whatever comes in contact with it.

name: Fiery Dance
effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Special.
description: The user cloaks itself in flames and shoots them while dancing gracefully.

name: Fire Blast
effect: Lethal. Roll 3 Chance Dice to apply Burn 3 to the foe.
description: The Pokémon shoots a giant fireball that explodes on contact with the foe, blasting fire in all directions.

name: Fire Fang
effect: Roll 2 Chance to Flinch the Foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Burn the foe.
description: The user breathes fire from its mouth while biting the target.

name: Fire Lash
effect: Reduce Foe's Defense.
description: With a whip of fire, the Pokémon ensnares its foe, who is left defenseless and at its mercy.

name: Fire Pledge
effect: All flammable plants and objects in the battlefield are covered in flames. Roll 1 Dice of Fire Damage at the end of every Round against everyone on the field.
description: The Pokémon chants to invoke the power of Fire. Its pledge is heard, then the flames consume everything around.

name: Fire Punch
effect: Fist Based. Roll 1 Chance Dice to apply Burn 2 to the foe.
description: The user can ignite its fists for a brief moment without any danger of getting burned. The foe may not be so lucky.

name: Fire Spin
effect: Blocks. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The user creates a vortex of fire that remains spinning in the battlefield, trapping the foe within.

name: Flame Burst
effect: After dealing damage, the user may roll 1 Dice of Damage against two other Targets.
description: A concentrated flameball that bursts on contact with the foe, scattering smaller flames around.

name: Flame Charge
effect: Increase the User's Dexterity.
description: The Pokémon uses its flames as propulsion to strike the foe.

name: Flame Wheel
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Burn the foe.
description: The user cloaks itself in flames and rolls to tackle the target.

name: Flamethrower
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 2 to the foe.
description: The user lets out a powerful fire stream that leaves a scorched trail.

name: Flare Blitz
effect: Recoil. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 3 to the foe.
description: The user sets itself on fire, recklessly charging against the target with a brutal strike.

name: Heat Crash
effect: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every 50 kgs. of weight above the target's weight, up to +4 Extra Dice.
description: The user slams the target with a body engulfed in fire.

name: Heat Wave
effect: Target all foes in Range. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Burn those affected.
description: The user breathes a giant wave of incandescent air that might set fire to whatever it touches.

name: Incinerate
effect: Destroy the held Berries of those affected.
description: The Pokémon releases a blast of fire that instantly consumes small flammable objects.

name: Inferno
effect: Lethal. Apply Burn 3 to the Foe.
description: Th Pokémon sets the foe on fire. These flames rise up to 6 feet. A very dangerous Move.

name: Lava Plume
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Burn those affected.
description: The user shoots up bits of molten lava that fall scattered around the field.

name: Mystical Fire
effect: Reduce Foe's Special.
description: This mystical fire not only burns the foe, it also drains its power.

name: Overheat
effect: Lethal. Reduce User's Special by 2.
description: A furious wave of scorching fire that will turn to ashes everything it touches, exhausting the user afterwards.

name: Shell Trap
effect: Volt. Low Priority 3. This Move strikes the next time the user is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical attack.
description: It apparently just buried underground, but secretly the Pokémon prepares its shell to detonate; anyone who steps on it will be blown to pieces.

name: Sunny Day
effect: Sunny Weather is activated for the next 4 Rounds.
description: The Pokémon will raise the temperature along with the sun, it doesn't work at night, indoors, underground or underwater.

name: Will-o-Wisp
effect: Burn the Foe.
description: The user calls a floating ember to consume the foe.

name: Acrobatics
effect: If the User has a Held Item, remove 2 Dice from the Damage Roll.
description: The user makes quick and graceful acrobatic moves to hit the foe, it will be swifter if nothing gets in the way.

name: Aerial Ace
effect: Never Fail.
description: The Pokémon rises, then plummets quickly to attack the opponent.

name: Air Cutter
effect: Target all foes in Range. High Critical.
description: The user will send out a wave of sharp wind that will harm anything it touches.

name: Air Slash
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
description: The user will surround the foe with razor-like wind that may knock it down.

name: Beak Blast
effect: Ranged. Charge Move. Low Priority 3. If the User is hit by a Non Ranged Physical Attack while this move is charging, Apply Burn 2 to the foe.
description: The Pokémon gets ready to release a boiling gas through its beak which gets incredibly hot. The resulting blast sounds like a train's horn.

name: Bounce
effect: Charge Move. While charging this Move, the user will be out of range. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
description: The Pokémon will jump 30 feet in the air before landing on top of the foe. The user won't suffer any falling damage.

name: Brave Bird
effect: Recoil.
description: The Pokémon flies straight at the foe at full speed, the collision might hurt both of them.

name: Chatter
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.
description: The user starts talking and giving orders in human language. It may be extremely confusing for the foes.

name: Defog
effect: Remove all Barriers (ie. Light Screen, Reflect) and any Entry Hazard and Evasion Modifier on the battlefield.
description: A strong current of wind that blows away any fog and even invisible barriers.

name: Drill Peck
effect: Lethal.
description: The user pierces the foe with its beak used as a drill. A dangerous move.

name: Feather Dance
effect: Reduce the foe's Strength by 2.
description: A beautiful dance that soothes the hearts of those who watch it, reducing their aggressive intentions.

name: Fly
effect: Charge Move. While charging this move, the User will be out of range, with the exception of the attacks Hurricane and Thunder.
description: The user flies up high in one action, then drops and strikes in the next one. The Pokémon can fly for extremely long periods of time without getting tired.

name: Gust
description: The Pokémon flaps its wings to strike the foe with wind.

name: Hurricane
effect: Lethal. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Confuse the Foe. If performed under Rain Weather, Add 3 Extra Dice to the Accuracy Roll.
description: The user attacks by wrapping the opponent in a fierce wind that carries the target up into the sky.

name: Mirror Move
effect: Copies the last Damaging Move the foe has performed.
description: The user concentrates and manages to imitate the last move used by the foe.

name: Peck
description: The Pokémon uses its beat or horn to jab the foe, hurting a little bit.

name: Pluck
effect: Never Fail. If the Target is holding a Berry, the User eats it and gains its effects.
description: The user gives a hard peck and may get something tasty out of the foe.

name: Roost
effect: Basic Heal. Until the User's next action this Pokémon will be vulnerable to Ground Type moves.
description: The Pokémon uses its action to land on the ground and relax.

name: Sky Attack
effect: Lethal. High Critical. Charge Move. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
description: The Pokémon darts from the sky with a graceful and lethal strike, propelling with the wing, crushing the foe on the ground.

name: Sky Drop
effect: Charge Move. While charging this move the Target is flinched. Flying Type Pokémon are immune to the Damage of this move. Lifting a target is restricted by the Strength of the User.
description: The user carries the opponent to the sky, then drops the target from that altitude.

name: Tailwind
effect: For the Next 4 Rounds. Increase the Dexterity of the User and All Allies in the field by 2.
description: User flaps its wings and casts a turbulent wind that helps the team move significantly faster.

name: Wing Attack
description: The user flies towards the foe and strikes with its wings.

name: Astonish
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
description: The user sneaks close and startles the foe.

name: Confuse Ray
effect: Confuse the foe.
description: The user flashes a sinister ray of bright light that leaves the target disoriented and confused.

name: Curse
effect: Roll half the user's HP as damage dice to itself. The target now has 2 additional in all of its rolls, these dice always land as '1'.
description: The user mutters words that become an evil incantation, the curse may only be lifted by a medium or through divine intervention.

name: Curse (Non-Ghost User)
effect: Increase the User's Strength and Defend. Reduce the User's Speed. This effect is only for Pokémon who are not Ghost-Type.
description: The Pokémon prepares to deal and receive damage by muttering something not appropriate for kids.

name: Destiny Bond
effect: If the user faints this Round due to Combat damage, the Pokémon that dealt the damage will faint at the same time.
description: The Pokémon creates a mystical bond with anyone that causes it harm. Whatever ill falls on the user, it will fall on the perpetrator too.

name: Grudge
effect: The User Faints. The foe gets its Will depleted. The Target may make a Loyalty roll, if the result is equal or superior to the User's Grudge Roll, it may keep 1 point of Will.
description: The user leaves an imprinting grudge over the foe, this makes the target unwilling to fight. It may only keep battling if something greater is at risk.

name: Hex
effect: If the Target is affected by a Status Ailment add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
description: The user casts a terrible hex over the target, the effects will be greater if the target is vulnerable.

name: Lick
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the Foe.
description: The user licks the foe. The saliva can numb the body of most creatures.

name: Night Shade
effect: Add 1 Dice of Damage for every 10 levels of the User (ie. The damage pool of a level 43 Pokémon is 4 Dice). Ignore Foe's Defenses.
description: The user casts a shade with a frightening mirage inside that torments the target.

name: Nightmare
effect: Will only work if the Target is asleep. Deal 1 Damage to the foe. Deal 1 Damage again at the beginning of each Round if the target is still asleep.
description: The user enters the target's dreams to torment it.

name: Ominous Wind
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Strength, Dexterity, Special, Defense, and Sp. Defense.
description: The Pokémon sends out a goosebump-inducing, repulsive wind that might make the user feel an evil rush.

name: Phantom Force
effect: Charge Move. While charging this Move, other Moves will not affect the user. If the Target made a Shielding Action the shield is destroyed and won't have any effect.
description: The Pokémon disappears into a dark dimension to infiltrate even the most impenetrable defenses. It may reappear during its next action.

name: Shadow Ball
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Sp. Defense.
description: The Pokémon hurls a sphere made of shadow and dark matter to harm the foe.

name: Shadow Bone
effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Reduce the Foe's Defense.
description: The bone that this Pokémon uses as a weapon contains a spirit, that spirit may cling into a victim, creating openings for its master.

name: Shadow Claw
effect: High Critical.
description: Claws become semi-ethereal and are able to briefly pierce armor, hide, skin and objects so it can strike the target on any weak spot.

name: Shadow Punch
effect: Fist Based. Never Fail.
description: The Pokémon punches through its own shadow. The attack comes out from the foe's shadows as if it were a portal.

name: Shadow Sneak
effect: Priority.
description: The user sneaks through darkness and strikes out of the target's shadow. The Pokémon can move freely inside shadows as if it were incorporeal.

name: Spirit Shackle
effect: Blocks.
description: While attacking, the user sneakily binds its foe's shadow to the ground. restricting its movement and making it unable to escape.

name: Spite
effect: Reduce Target's Will to 1 point temporarily.
description: The target feels overwhelmed by feelings of dread.

name: Trick-or-Treat
effect: Add the Ghost type to Target's Type. (ie. Meowth will now by Normal/Ghost Charizard will now be Fire/Flying/Ghost) If the Pokémon already has a third type attached, replace it.
description: The Pokémon takes the target Trick-or-Treating. The target gets a ghost costume which somehow cannot be removed without a medium's help.

name: Absorb
effect: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt rounded down.
description: The user absorbs the vital energy out of its foe.

name: Aromatherapy
effect: Cure User and Allies from Burn, Freeze, Paralysis, Poison or Sleep.
description: The Pokémon releases medicinal scents and vapors to refresh the user and its allies.

name: Bullet Seed
effect: Ranged. Successive Actions.
description: The Pokémon shoots seeds rapidly as if they were bullets.

name: Cotton Guard
effect: Increase the User's Defense by 3.
description: The user covers itself in cotton puffs that severely reduce the impact of physical attacks.

name: Cotton Spore
effect: Reduce foe's Dexterity by 2.
description: The Pokémon covers the foe in cotton, disrupting its movement speed.

name: Energy Ball
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Sp. Defense.
description: The Pokémon gathers nature's energy in a ball and hurls it at the foe. Trees and bushes may be left opaque and sad.

name: Forest's Curse
effect: Add the Grass Type to the Target's Type (ie. Nidoran will now be Poison/Grass Heracross will now be Bug/Fight/Grass). If the Pokémon already has a third type attached, replace it.
description: The user calls the forest to lay a curse upon the target, making it grow vines and vegetation around its whole body. The curse will not be easily lifted without a medium's help.

name: Frenzy Plant
effect: Must Recharge.
description: User roots down and calls the plants to grow in a frenzy around the foe, though it leaves the user exhausted.

name: Giga Drain
effect: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.
description: The Pokémon extracts a great amount of vital energy from the foe's body.

name: Grass Knot
effect: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every 50 kgs. of weight on the foe, up to +4 Extra Dice.
description: The user snares the target's feet with grass, making it fall to the ground. The bigger the foe the harder the fall.

name: Grass Pledge
effect: Reduce the Dexterity of those affected.
description: The Pokémon chants to invoke the power of Grass. Its pledge is heard and the soil trembles and the ground crumbles as vegetation rises to grapple anyone in the field.

name: Grass Whistle
effect: Sound Based. Put the Target to Sleep.
description: The user plays a beautiful and soothing melody that lulls the target into a peaceful sleep.

name: Grassy Terrain
effect: For the next 4 Rounds, User and Allies on the ground Restore 1 HP at the end of each round. Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Rolls of Grass Type Moves.
description: The Pokémon calls upon the healing power of nature to grow a patch of miraculous grass on its side of the battlefield.

name: Horn Leech
effect: The User restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.
description: The user rams the foe and absorbs some of its vital energy with its horns.

name: Ingrain
effect: User Heals 1 HP at the end of every Round. While this move is active the User cannot flee or switch out from battle.
description: The Pokémon roots itself to the ground, absorbing the nutrients and recovering health.

name: Leaf Blade
effect: Lethal. High Critical.
description: The Pokémon uses the sharp leaves on its body to cut through the foe.

name: Leaf Storm
effect: Reduce the User's Special by 2.
description: A furious storm of sharp leaves swirls and pierces the target. The user is left exhausted.

name: Leaf Tornado
effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce the Foe's Accuracy.
description: A bust worth of sharp leaves swirls around the foe making it harder for it to aim attacks properly.

name: Leafage
effect: Ranged.
description: The user throws leaf darts towards its foe.

name: Leech Seed
effect: At the end of the Round. Roll 1 Dice of Damage to the foe, restore 1 HP to the user for every damage dealt this way. Grass type Pokémon are immune to this move.
description: The user plants some seeds on the target, the seeds sprout and restore the user's health by absorbing the foe's vital energy.

name: Magical Leaf
effect: Never Fail.
description: The user sends out a floating leaf that will pursue the target until it hits.

name: Mega Drain
effect: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.
description: The user absorbs a big amount of vital energy from the target.

name: Needle Arm
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.
description: The Pokémon hits the foe with its flailing arms, some thorns may get stuck on the target like needles.

name: Petal Blizzard
description: The Pokémon showers the battlefield with a raging blizzard of petals and leaves, anyone close to the user will suffer the consequences.

name: Petal Dance
effect: Rampage.
description: The Pokémon starts swirling petals around in a true display of nature's power, the petals are guided by the wind to strike the foe.

name: Power Whip
description: The Pokémon violently lashes the foe with its vines or a part of its body, acting as a powerful whip.

name: Razor Leaf
effect: Ranged. High Critical.
description: The Pokémon shoots one or more sharp leaves that cut through all targets as if they were razors.

name: Seed Bomb
effect: Ranged.
description: The user throws a big seed that explodes on contact with the foe.

name: Sleep Powder
effect: Put the Target to Sleep.
description: The user scatters powder around, anyone who comes in contact with it will fall asleep.

name: Solar Beam
effect: Charge Move. If there is a Sunny Weather, you skip this Move's Charge action. If performed under Rain, Sandstorm or Hail Weather, this Move takes two actions to Charge.
description: The user focuses the sunlight it has absorbed into a powerful and devastating beam of light.

name: Solar Blade
effect: Charge Move. If there is a Sunny Weather, you skip this Move's Charge action. If performed under Rain, Sandstorm or Hail Weather, this Move takes two actions to Charge.
description: The Pokémon focuses the sunlight on its sharp leaves, then releases the energy with a shattering blow.

name: Spiky Shield
effect: Priority 3. Shield. Reduce 3 Damage Dice from the next attack and deal 2 Damage Dice to the attacker if it used a physical non-ranged Move.
description: The Pokémon covers itself with a thorn filled shell, the foe will be damaged if it hits directly into it.

name: Spore
effect: Put the Target to Sleep.
description: A powerful somniferous spore that is shot at the target to make it fall asleep.

name: Strength Sap
effect: Reduce Foe's Strength. User Heals HP equal to the Foe's Current Strength Score. Healing in-battle limitations apply.
description: The Pokémon looks for a weak point on its foe, then feeds on its vital energy. The foe is left feeling feeble.

name: Stun Spore
effect: Paralyze the Foe.
description: A blow of dust that paralyzes the target on the spot and cramps its muscles.

name: Synthesis
effect: Basic Heal. If performed under Sunny weather, this Move is a Complete Heal.
description: The Pokémon uses the sunlight to regain its vitality.

name: Trop Kick
effect: Reduce Foe's Strength.
description: The user strikes with an intense and alluring kick.

name: Vine Whip
description: The Pokémon uses its slender vines as a whip against the foe. They are as long as 20 feet.

name: Wood Hammer
effect: Recoil.
description: The Pokémon recklessly slams the foe with a part of its rugged body, the user also gets hurt in the process.

name: Worry Seed
effect: Until the end of the Scene, Target's Ability is now "Insomnia".
description: The user plants a seed in its foe. It causes a restless preoccupation that won't let it sleep at night.

name: Bone Club
effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.
description: The user hits the target with a bone, the smack may leave a bump on the target's head.

name: Bone Rush
effect: Successive Actions.
description: The user quickly strikes the foe with a bone, one blow after another.

name: Bonemerang
effect: Ranged. Double Action.
description: The Pokémon throws a bone to hit the foe. The bone returns like a boomerang striking a second time.

name: Bulldoze
effect: Reduce the Dexterity of those affected.
description: The user stomps and tramples the place, breaking stones, trees and everything nearby.

name: Dig
effect: Charge Move. While charging this move, the User will be out of range. Can be hit by Earthquake, Magnitude or a similar move.
description: The user digs a tunnel on the ground and attacks while coming out from below.

name: Drill Run
effect: High Critical.
description: The user rotates its body imitating a drill and crashes against the foe. This attack may pierce through walls and floors with ease and great precision.

name: Earth Power
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense.
description: The user sends out a subterranean wave that hurts on the ground below the target. It looks like the earth molds to the Pokémon's will.

name: Earthquake
effect: Area Attack. Ranged.
description: The Pokémon focuses its energy into shaking the ground, everyone around will be thrown like a rag doll.

name: Fissure
effect: Ranged. Deal damage to the Target equal to their remaining HP.
description: The user tears the ground apart in a monstrous display of force, if the foe falls through the fissure it might need a rescue team to get it out.

name: High Horsepower
description: The Pokémon rushes towards its target and tramples it without mercy.

name: Magnitude
effect: Ranged 1 Dice to determine this Move's Power.
description: The user quakes the ground plates. Some plates will move easier than others.

name: Mud Bomb
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce the Foe's Accuracy.
description: The Pokémon shoots a ball made of mud that bursts on the target, some mud may get on its eyes.

name: Mud Shot
effect: Reduce the Foe's Dexterity.
description: The Pokémon shoots a stream of mud that covers the foe, obstructing its movement.

name: Mud Slap
effect: Reduce the foe's Accuracy.
description: The user hurls some mud to the face of the foe, leaving it unable to see clearly.

name: Mud Sport
effect: For the next 4 Rounds Electric Type attacks won't add their Power to the Damage Pool.
description: The user covers everything with mud, reducing the effectiveness of electric attacks made on the field.

name: Rototiller
effect: Increase the Strength and Special of all Grass Type Pokémon in the battlefield.
description: The Pokémon digs around and moves the soil to make it ideal for plant growth.

name: Sand Attack
effect: Reduce the foe's Accuracy.
description: The user shoots some sand into the opponent's eyes.

name: Sand Tomb
effect: Ranged. Block. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of every Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The Pokémon creates a shifting sand pit around the foe, leaving it unable to escape.

name: Shore Up
effect: Basic Heal. If performed under Sandstorm weather, this move is a Complete Heal.
description: The Pokémon gathers the sand around itself to restore its body to shape.

name: Spikes
effect: Foe Pokémon that enters the battlefield will lose 1 HP, this effect does not stack. Pokémon with the Levitate ability and Flying Type Pokémon are immune to this effect. Entry Hazard.
description: The Pokémon shoots pointy pebbles or thorns around the field that deal damage to anyone coming from that side.

name: Stomping Tantrum
effect: Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of this move is the User failed the Accuracy Roll of the last Move it performed.
description: The Pokémon throws a tantrum all over the place, it becomes worse if something has frustrated it earlier.

name: Aurora Beam
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Strength.
description: The Pokémon shoots a beautiful rainbow colored beam that may leave the foe flabbergasted.

name: Aurora Veil
effect: User and Allies will receive 1 less Damage from both Physical and Special Attacks. This move will fail if not performed under Hail Weather. Lasts until Hail Weather is over.
description: The Pokémon uses the surrounding hail to shield itself and its allies from incoming damage.

name: Avalanche
effect: Low Priority 4. If the user received damage from the target this Round, Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
description: The user builds up a lot of snow around itself, if anything disturbs the snow, it will fall on the attacker like an avalanche.

name: Blizzard
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Freeze those affected. If performed under Hail Weather, Add 3 Extra Dice to Accuracy and ignore any Increased Evasion the foes may have.
description: The user swirls a violent gelid wind around the foes. This blizzard may not last long but tremendously strong.

name: Freeze Dry
effect: Water type Pokémon are dealt 2 Added Automated Damage.
description: The user freezes all moisture in the environment, water type Pokémon suffer greatly.

name: Frost Breath
effect: This Move is always a Critical Hit and it gets the proper bonus for it.
description: The user shoots a gelid breath against the target that sends a chill through the spine. The sudden change of temperature can bring anyone to its knees.

name: Hail
effect: Hail Weather is activated for the next 4 Rounds.
description: The user summons a hailstorm that will stay on the battlefield for some time.

name: Haze
effect: Remove all Increased or Reduced Attributes and Traits on everyone on the Battlefield.
description: The user sends out a haze that disturbs all the Pokémon engaged in battle. It may conceal whoever is inside.

name: Ice Ball
effect: Successive Actions. Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Roll of the last Ice Ball hit the user performs. If the Pokémon used Defense Curl this Round, add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Roll of every hit.
description: The user curls into a snowball, rolling against the foe. The ball grows bigger as it rolls.

name: Ice Beam
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Freeze the Foe.
description: The user shoots a freezing ray that greatly lowers the temperature of anything it hits.

name: Ice Fang
effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Freeze the foe.
description: The user bites the foe and releases a gelid breath through its mouth.

name: Ice Hammer
effect: Reduce User's Dexterity.
description: The Pokémon uses its powerful gelid arms and strikes the foe with a swing motion.

name: Ice Punch
effect: Ranged. Priority.
description: The Pokémon delivers a strike covered in ice. The user's hands can freeze anything they touch.

name: Ice Shard
effect: Ranged. Priority.
description: The user quickly freezes some bits of ice and throws them at the target.

name: Icicle Crash
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.
description: The user drops a big icicle over the foe, the impact may leave the opponent dazed.

name: Icicle Spear
effect: Ranged. Successive Actions.
description: The user launches a wave of small but pointy icicles towards the target.

name: Icy Wind
effect: Reduce Dexterity of those affected.
description: A breeze so cold that it chills you to the bone, making it harder to move.

name: Mist
effect: For the next 4 Rounds, the User and Allies cannot have their Attributes or Traits reduced.
description: The user cloaks itself and its allies within a cold mist with mystic properties. It may conceal whoever is nearby.

name: Powder Snow
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Freeze those affected.
description: The user sends out a wind current full of snowflakes that freeze whatever they touch. This powder can easily turn a room to ice.

name: Sheer Cold
effect: Deal damage to the Target equal to its remaining HP.
description: The user freezes the foe from the inside out. Victims of this attack will need urgent medical attention.

name: Acupressure
effect: Increase a Random Attribute. If this Move is used again, the previous Attribute Modifier is removed.
description: The user starts pushing its pressure points releasing the energy that was stored in its body.

name: After You
effect: The Target will go first in the order of Initiative. Lasts for the rest of this Battle.
description: The user bows and courteously lets an ally or foe use their action first.

name: Assist
effect: Choose one Move known by a random member of your party. You performed that Move using the Accuracy roll from Assist.
description: The Pokémon hurriedly remembers one action performed by a partner. Some Pokémon can even do what a human does and assist him with any tasks.

name: Attract
effect: If Successful, Target is now In Love. This Move fails if target is from same gender as the User of genderless.
description: The user makes use of its good looks and attitude to infatuate its foe.

name: Barrage
effect: Ranged. Successive Actions.
description: The Pokémon throws many round objects at the target, one after the other.

name: Baton Pass
effect: The User returns to this Pokéball. Any Increased Trait on the User is passed on to the next Pokémon. That Pokémon is ready to fight on the next Round. The User can't Increase those Traits again for the rest of the scene. Switcher Move.
description: The user stores part of its power on a twig or a stick, anyone who touches the time will receive its might.

name: Belly Drum
effect: User deals Damage to itself equal to Half of its total HP rounded down. Increase User's Strength by 3.
description: The Pokémon roars a war cry while hitting its belly.

name: Bestow
effect: If target is not holding an Item, the User gives its own.
description: The Pokémon respectfully offers an item, the target will take it and keep it to be polite.

name: Bide
effect: The User will take the next 2 hits. After those two attacks, you may use this Move again to retaliate with Strength + Twice the Damage receive from those 2 hits.
description: The user endures the hit then unleashes an attack even greater.

name: Bind
effect: Block. Deal 2 dice of damage at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The Pokémon uses its body to bind the foe, restraining and squeezing it.

name: Block
effect: Blocks.
description: The user moves swiftly, blocking escape routes of the foe.

name: Body Slam
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.
description: The user charges against the foe, using its body to knock it down, leaving the target stunned.

name: Boomburst
effect: Sound Based.
description: The user creates an explosive sound that deafens everyone in the battlefield.

name: Camouflage
effect: The user changes type to whatever terrain it's standing on (ie. User stands on rocks in a cave, becomes rock type). Lasts for the rest of the scene.
description: The user mimics the environment, it becomes one with the surroundings.

name: Captivate
effect: If the target is from the opposite gender. Reduce its Special by 2.
description: The Pokémon performs an irresistible flirt, those of the opposite gender will be unfocused to fight.

name: Chip Away
effect: This attack ignores Defense and Evasion modifiers on the foe.
description: The user looks for an opening and strikes directly there, it nibbles bit by bit even the toughest of surfaces.

name: Comet Punch
effect: Successive Actions. Fist Based.
description: The user throws a quick series of punches at the foe.

name: Confide
effect: Reduce the foes' Special.
description: The Pokémon tells a secret to the target. The foe loses its ability to concentrate.

name: Constrict
effect: Blocks. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The Pokémon uses its body to hold and constrict the foe. It won't let go easily.

name: Conversion
effect: The user changes its type at random.
description: The Pokémon downloads the data a Move to add it to its code.

name: Conversion 2
effect: After being dealt damage, choose a Type resistant to the Type of that attack. That's the Type of the User until it uses this Move again.
description: The Pokémon downloads the data of a move that was used against it. Change the code of the user to a type resistant to that move.

name: Copycat
effect: Copies the last move the foe has performed.
description: The user will closely watch the movements of the target and will imitate them to perfection.

name: Covet
effect: If the user is not holding an item, Steal the target's Held Item.
description: The user approaches with caution, deals a quick strike and takes the chance to steal the target's item.

name: Crush Claw
effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce the target's Defense by 2. Lethal.
description: The user crushes its claws against the foe, it may pierce the skin of the foe.

name: Cut
effect: May be used to cut down trees and clear paths.
description: A slim but precise cut that may slice through anything.

name: Defense Curl
effect: Increase the User's Defense.
description: THe user curls like a ball to protect against most threats.

name: Disable
effect: The Target cannot use the last move it performed. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The user hits a nerve on the foe, impeding it from performing its previous action for a short while.

name: Dizzy Punch
effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe. Fist Based.
description: A swift punch to the jaw that spins the target and may leave it quite dizzy and disoriented.

name: Double Hit
effect: Double Action.
description: The Pokémon uses the classic "One-Two" to attack the foe.

name: Double Slap
effect: Successive Actions.
description: The user attacks its foe with two or more slaps in the face.

name: Double Team
effect: Increase the User's Evasion by 2.
description: The user moves rapidly around the foe, creating illusory copies of itself.

name: Double-Edge
effect: Recoil.
description: The user recklessly slams its foe to deal a lot of damage, but it may also hurt itself in the process.

name: Echoed Voice
effect: Sound Based. This move can be used many times in the same Round. Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every consecutive action the user performs. Up to 8 dice may be added this way. If the user performs another action the damage resets.
description: The user shouts loudly and the echo answers back, it will yell louder every time the echo talks back.

name: Egg Bomb
effect: Ranged.
description: The user throws a big egg with great force against its foe.

name: Encore
effect: For the duration of this effect, the target will repeat the exact same action sequence it had this round. Target must have had an action sequence. Last 4 Rounds. Priority 3.
description: The user claps and cheers at the target to encourage it to repeat what it just did.

name: Endeavor
effect: Roll Damage equal to the Difference between user's Full HP and its Current HP (up to 10). User cannot reduce the target's HP to lower than its own remaining HP. Ignore foe's Defenses.
description: Will pure willpower, the user struggles with its foe despite the pain.

name: Endure
effect: Priority 5. Shield. The user cannot be reduced to less than 1 HP due to the next attack. Status ailments, Recoil or self inflicted damage will still affect it.
description: The user gets prepared to receive a fatal blow. It resists the pain despite being seriously hurt.

name: Entrainment
effect: The target's Ability is replaced by the User's own Ability. (ie. Luvdiscs Swift Swim Ability will replace Geodude Sturdy Ability).
description: The Pokémon dances with a catchy rhythm. The target starts dancing too and both connect to a very personal level through this performance.

name: Explosion
effect: After the damage is dealt, the User faints. Lethal.
description: The user focuses on exploding its body, the explosion deals a massive wave of damage. A very dangerous move.

name: Extreme Speed
effect: Priority 2. Triple the Pokémon movement speed.
description: The user charges at a blinding speed against the target.

name: Facade
effect: If User's got a Status Ailment (Paralysis, Poison, Burn, etc.) Add 3 Dice to the Damage Roll of this move.
description: The Pokémon will make an upfront attack, if the user is suffering the attack will be stronger.

name: Fake Out
effect: Priority. Flinch the foe. This move will only work the First Round the Pokémon is out in battle. From the second round on, it will fail automatically.
description: While still preparing for battle, the user will suddenly attack the foe.

name: False Swipe
effect: The foe will always keep at least one HP when hit by this Move.
description: The user strikes the foe but lowers the power of the blow at the last second.

name: Feint
effect: Priority 2. This Move ignores any Shielding Move.
description: The Pokémon feints a strike, then hits for real even if the foe attempts to protect itself.

name: Flail
effect: Add 1 Dice to the Damage Roll for every lost HP the user has, up to +8.
description: The use flails and struggles to survive, the more weakened it is the stronger this attack will be.

name: Flash
effect: Reduce 1 Dice to the foe's Accuracy.
description: The user suddenly emits a blinding light around its body, dazing its opponents in the process.

name: Focus Energy
effect: All your moves have High Critical. Lasts for the rest of the scene.
description: The Pokémon's energy is raised to make all strikes much more precise.

name: Follow Me
effect: Foes will target the user this turn. Priority 5.
description: The Pokémon will draw everyone's attention. All foes are taunted to do their worst.

name: Foresight
effect: Ignore any Increase in the foe's Evasion. User's Normal and Fighting Moves can affect Ghost Types and Ghost Moves can affect Normal Types.
description: The Pokémon uses its developed senses and mental ability to foresee the immediate future.

name: Frustration
effect: Add +1 Dice to the Damage Roll for every missing point of Happiness on the User.
description: A move that relies on how badly a Pokémon has been treated to make it vicious and uncaring.

name: Fury Attack
effect: Successive Actions.
description: The Pokémon goes at it with everything it's got in a rather disordered way.

name: Fury Swipes
effect: Successive Actions.
description: The user swiftly uses its claws to strike the foe multiple times.

name: Giga Impact
effect: Must Recharge. Lethal.
description: The Pokémon strikes with a brutal force using all its body. The impact leaves the user somewhat stunned.

name: Glare
effect: Paralyze the foe.
description: The Pokémon uses its intimidating glare to paralyze the foe with sheer terror.

name: Growl
effect: Reduce the foe's Strength. Sound Based.
description: Either by a menacing attitude or cute demeanor, the foe will be unsure about attacking the user with full force.

name: Growth
effect: Increase the User's Strength and Special.
description: The Pokémon expands its body, it grows bigger and stronger.

name: Guillotine
effect: The target is dealt damage equal to its remaining HP.
description: The Pokémon uses the sharpest part of its body to almost snap the neck of its foe. It is a devastating attack. The foe must be lucky to get out of it alive.

name: Harden
effect: Increase the User's Defense.
description: The user stiffens its body and prepares for any incoming attack.

name: Head Charge
effect: Recoil.
description: The Pokémon clashes against the foe using its head as a boulder.

name: Headbutt
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch. May call Random Encounters when hitting trees.
description: THe user strikes the foe with its hard head. Perfect for taking down fruits from trees or shake Pokémon out of their nests on treetops.

name: Heal Bell
effect: Cure the User and allies suffering from Status Conditions, they don't need to be on the battlefield to get this effect. Sound Based.
description: The Pokémon chimes a magical bell, legend says the soothing sound has healing properties.

name: Helping Hand
effect: Target Pokémon gets 2 Extra Dice on its next Skill, Accuracy and Damage Rolls. Priority 5.
description: The Pokémon assists an ally. Together they are stronger.

name: Hidden Power
effect: Plot Device.
description: Every Pokémon has an unknown power that can be released with surprising results.

name: Horn Attack
description: The Pokémon attacks the foe with its horns, this strike is very painful.

name: Horn Drill
effect: The target is dealt damage equal to its remaining HP.
description: The user stabs the target with a horn used like a drill, the foe is often left in a critical condition. A move to be wary of.

name: Howl
effect: Increase the User's Strength.
description: The Pokémon let's out an impressive howl, making it appear a lot more menacing.

name: Hyper Beam
effect: Must Recharge. Lethal.
description: The Pokémon casts an incredible beam that leaves a giant trail of destruction behind. The user is left exhausted.

name: Hyper Fang
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Flinch.
description: The Pokémon bites hard into the foe with its powerful fangs.

name: Hyper Voice
effect: Sound Based.
description: The user emits a horrible echoing sound that could burst the ears.

name: Laser Focus
effect: The next time the user lands a hit, it will be treated as if it were a Critical Hit.
description: Through its incredible awareness the Pokémon finds a straight path into a weak point of the foe. The attack that follows is usually devastating.

name: Last Resort
effect: It can be used only after the Pokémon has performed all its known moves at least once during the battle.
description: When everything else fails, the Pokémon gives everything in a last resort attack.

name: Leer
effect: Reduce the Defense by 1 of those affected.
description: A vicious glare that will make any opponent doubt its own strength in battle.

name: Lock-On
effect: The next attack the user performs has 2 automatic unremovable successes on its Accuracy Roll.
description: The Pokémon's eyes zoom at a moving target to ensure that the next attack will be dealt with precision.

name: Lovely Kiss
effect: Put the Target to Sleep.
description: The Pokémon approaches the foe with a kiss. Its ugly face and awful smooch make the poor creature feint in terror.

name: Lucky Chant
effect: User and Allies can ignore two "1"s in all their rolls. If an opponent would land a Critical hit, it doesn't. Good things happen at the storyteller's discretion.
description: The user chants an incantation to the skies, the beautiful performance grants this Pokémon and its allies divine protection.

name: Me First
effect: Priority 4. Redirect the effects of a Support Move that would affect the user or its side of the battlefield towards the foe's (ie. The foe used Stealth Rock, with Magic Coat it will now affect the foe's side instead of yours).
description: The user anticipates the next attack so it can hit the target with an astounding speed.

name: Mean Look
effect: Blocks.
description: THe Pokémon gives a menacing look that freezes the foe on the spot with intense fear.

name: Mega Kick
description: The Pokémon throws a mega powered kick to the foe's' face.

name: Mega Punch
description: The Pokémon throws a mega potent hook towards the foe's face.

name: Metronome
effect: Roll a dice to determine this move's power. The appearance and Type of this move may be changed at the Storyteller's Discretion.
description: The Pokémon waves its hands with rhythm. The energy around follows the cadence and manifests with an impressive attack.

name: Milk Drink
effect: Basic Heal.
description: The Pokémon drinks a glass of its own milk, the rich taste and nutrients revitalize it.

name: Mimic
effect: Copies the last move the target used until the end of the scene. That move replaces Mimic.
description: Making use of its acting talents, the Pokémon imitates what the target just did.

name: Mind Reader
effect: This Pokémon gets 2 automatic successes on the next Accuracy Roll or Evasion Roll against the target.
description: The user reads the foe's mind. It knows exactly what to do next.

name: Minimize
effect: Increase the User's Evasion.
description: The Pokémon compacts its body, appearing small than its normal size.

name: Morning Sun
effect: Basic Heal. This Move only heals half the normal HP during the night, indoors or underground. Becomes a Complete Heal during Sunny Weather.
description: The sun shines brightly on the Pokémon and makes it feel rejuvenated like early in the morning.

name: Multi-Attack
effect: This Move's type will always match the User's first Type.
description: A weird-looking Pokémon charged against its foes, the same attacked released different kinds of energy depending on the disk it was holding.

name: Natural Gift
effect: User loses its held berry. Ranged. See Natural Gift on p.368 for more info.
description: The user throws its berry at the foe, the results can be quite surprising.

name: Nature Power
effect: The type of this move is determined by the environment. See Nature Power p.368 for more info.
description: The Pokémon makes use of the terrain and asks the nature for aid in battle.

name: Noble Roar
effect: Reduce the foe's Strength and Special by 1.
description: The Pokémon makes a roar that commands respect and authority over anyone listening.

name: Odor Sleuth
effect: Ignore any Increase in the foe's Evasion. User's Normal and Fighting Moves can affect Ghost Types and Ghost Moves can affect Normal Types. Add all successful dice to any Rolls to track the target.
description: The Pokémon uses its keen smell to detect the foe.

name: Pain Split
effect: For the rest of the scene, pool together the Pain Penalizations on the User and the Target, then divide them evenly between the two. If the result is an odd number, the foe will get the bigger Pain Penalization, HP remains the same.
description: The user shares its pain with the foe. After a short while it becomes excruciating for the target.

name: Pay Day
effect: Everytime this Move is used to deal damage, a quantity of money equal to the User's Level will come into its trainer's possession after the battle. The money might be scattered or be part of a battle reward.
description: This move grants good fortune, making it more likely to get more money after each battle.

name: Perish Song
effect: After three rounds, if any Pokémon who heard the song is not removed from battle, it will receive its remaining HP as damage. Sound Based.
description: A song of mourning and despair that resonates on the minds of anyone who listens. Makes you feel like you are on your deathbed.

name: Play Nice
effect: Reduce the foe's Strength by 1.
description: The user starts playing with the foe in a friendly way. This makes the foe reconsider its aggressive demeanor.

name: Pound
description: A decent hit to smash the foes.

name: Present
effect: Roll dice with a 50-50 chance of dealing 2 set damage to the target or recovering 2 HP to the target.
description: The user approaches its foe and gives it a lovely present that may be nice or may be a prank.

name: Protect
effect: Priority 5. Shield. Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage Pool. Negate effects of Support Moves that target the user. Reduce to zero the set damage from a move the user would take.
