description: The user creates an energy shield to deflect a blow. Some Pokémon may even perform an amazing parry to block the incoming attack.

name: Psych Up
effect: Copy the Target's Attribute and Trait Modifiers and keep them until the end of the scene.
description: The Pokémon mentalizes itself stronger than anyone. They feel good. They can win. They. Can. Do. This.

name: Quick Attack
effect: Priority. Double the Pokémon's movement speed.
description: An attack as fast as lightning.

name: Rage
effect: If the Pokémon receives damage after using this move, Increase the User's Strength.
description: The user gets angry and throws a tantrum at the foe. If the attacker keeps on fighting, it will make the user rage even harder.

name: Rapid Spin
effect: If there are Spikes, Leech Seed or Stealth Rocks on the field, eliminate them from the battlefield.
description: The Pokémon spins swiftly to strike the foe, anything near will be scattered around.

name: Razor Wind
effect: High Critical. Charge.
description: A sharp wind current is unleashed against anyone standing against this Pokémon.

name: Recover
effect: Basic Heal. May cure Lethal Damage.
description: The Pokémon concentrates on restoring its own cells faster than anything imaginable.

name: Recycle
effect: The Pokémon reuses an Item that has already been spent. (Berries etc.) An Item may not be recycled more than 5 times.
description: One Pokémon's trash is another one's treasure.

name: Reflect Type
effect: The Pokémon is now the same type of one of its foes. Lasts for a Scene or until this move is used again.
description: The Pokémon appears to change its own physiology. This effect changes the Type of the user to match another Pokémon in sight.

name: Refresh
effect: The User cure itself from Poison, Burn or Paralysis.
description: The Pokémon takes a few seconds to cool down and get back in the game.

name: Retaliate
effect: If an ally fainted during this or the last Round, add 3 Dice to the Damage Roll of this Move.
description: A powerful attack. It will be even stronger if the user just suffered a great loss.

name: Return
effect: Add 1 Dice to the Damage Roll for every point of Happiness on the User.
description: If the Pokémon is treated with care and love, it will return that affection by giving all it's got in battle.

name: Revelation Dance
effect: This Move's type will always match the User's first Type.
description: The Pokémon performs a dance, the dance's energy influences the Type of this Move.

name: Roar
effect: Low Priority 6. In the wild the battle ends, in an official fight, the Pokémon switches out if its the last or only Pokémon the move fails. Switcher Move.
description: A mighty roar that scares the foe.

name: Rock Climb
effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe. Outside of battle it may be used to climb with ease.
description: The user climbs on top of the foe. This may be confusing for some Pokémon.

name: Round
effect: If the User and an Ally are able to use Round, both may choose to do it at the same time. Both Pokémon add 3 Dice to the Damage Roll.
description: The user attacks the foe with a song, if a teammate joins the song that attack will be stronger.

name: Safeguard
effect: For the next 4 Rounds, the User and its Allies won't be affected by Status Ailments (Burn, Poison, Sleep,Confuse). Lasts 4 Rounds. Prior Status ailments remain.
description: The Pokémon creates an energy shield that protects everyone from harm.

name: Scary Face
effect: Reduce the foe's Dexterity by 2.
description: By making a frightening face, the Pokémon makes others think twice about coming near.

name: Scratch
description: The Pokémon uses its sharp claws to scratch the enemy.

name: Screech
effect: Reduce the foe's Defense by 2. Sound Based.
description: The user disrupts the fighting stance of its foe by sending a sharp sound to the foe's ears.

name: Secret Power
effect: Inflicts abnormal effects. See Secret Power p.368 for more info.
description: This moves absorbs the energy around the user. It may unleash that power in unexpected ways.

name: Self Destruct
effect: After performing the move, the user receives damage equal to its remaining HP.
description: The Pokémon makes use of its ability to blow up parts of its own body in an impressive display of power.

name: Sharpen
effect: Increase the User's Strength 1.
description: The user cuts down the rough edges of its body to make it as sharp as a razor.

name: Shell Smash
effect: Increase the User's Strength, Special, and Dexterity by 2. Reduces Defense and Special Defense by 2.
description: By breaking its own shell, the user sacrifices defense in exchange for being free to fight will all its power.

name: Simple Beam
effect: Target Pokémon ability is now "Simple".
description: The Pokémon sends out a small psychic wave to its target, giving it a simpler point of view about the world.

name: Sing
effect: Inflict Sleep on the target. Sound Based.
description: With a charming song, the user lulls its foe to sleep.

name: Sketch
effect: Permanently copies a move the target used. Once Copied "Sketch" disappears.
description: The Pokémon draws its foe performing a move, it learns how to perform that move in the process.

name: Skull Bash
effect: Increase the User's Defense. Charge.
description: The Pokémon withdraws to its shell then charges against the foe.

name: Slack Off
effect: Basic Heal.
description: The Pokémon gets lazy and loafs around instead of fighting. This makes up for a short rest.

name: Slam
description: The user slams the foe with its tail, vines, etc. to deal a decent amount of damage.

name: Slash
effect: High Critical. Lethal.
description: Using parts of its body as a blade the Pokémon pierces and tears the foe with a vicious force.

name: Sleep Talk
effect: While this Pokémon is asleep, it may use one of its Moves at Random.
description: After falling asleep, the Pokémon is still dreaming about the fight.

name: Smelling Salts
effect: If the Target is Paralyzed, add 2 Dice to the Damage Roll cure target's Paralysis afterwards.
description: The Pokémon throws some volatile salts onto the foe's face, a paralyzed Pokémon will get a strong smell.

name: Smokescreen
effect: Reduce the foe's Accuracy.
description: The user covers its foe with a cloud of smoke. Some Pokémon hide inside this screen while others use it as a cover to escape.

name: Snore
effect: This move can only be used is the user asleep. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
description: After falling asleep the user lets out a powerful snore, disrupting any focus the foe had.

name: Soft Boiled
effect: Basic Heal.
description: The user boils a freshly laid egg and restores Health with the energy stored within.

name: Sonic Boom
effect: This moves always inflicts 1 damage.
description: The Pokémon attacks with a small destructive shock that can go through armor, thich hide, or walls to deal some damage.

name: Spike Cannon
effect: Ranged. Successive Actions.
description: The Pokémon shoots a wave of pointy projectiles at the foe.

name: Spit Up
effect: Must have used the move "Stockpile" prior to this move, otherwise it will fail. Lose all Stockpile modifiers.
description: After storing power, the Pokémon spits that energy at the foe. The user returns to its original size.

name: Splash
description: The user just flops splashing some water, this has no effect at all.

name: Spotlight
effect: Priority 3. Foes will target One Ally this turn.
description: The user points a focused light onto one of its allies as if it were on a stage, the ally can't help but catching everyone's attention onto itself.

name: Stockpile
effect: Increase the User's Defense and Sp. Defense by 1
description: The Pokémon swells up by storing power with its mouth, this makes the user a little more resistant to damage.

name: Stomp
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
description: The Pokémon steps and stomps the for, the weight may leave the target squashed on the floor.

name: Strength
effect: Outside of battle, using this move allows the Pokémon to lift double the normal weight it should be able to.
description: The Pokémon strains its muscles to go beyond their own limits.

name: Struggle
effect: Recoil. This move does not have a type. By having this move the Pokémon will not faint after depleting its Will. Struggle is the only move that can be used after that.
description: Even against all the odds the Pokémon will remain fighting until its last breath.

name: Substitute
effect: Deal 2 Damage to the user and put a decoy with 2 HP with the same Defenses as the user. If the decoy's HP is depleted, it disappears and the user comes back into the fight. Decoy can only be affected by damaging moves.
description: The Pokémon disappears in a poof of smoke. When the smoke vanishes, an object identical to the user remains in its place to shield it from harm. It looks amazingly real.

name: Super Fang
effect: Damage Roll is Half of the Foe's remaining HP (up to 10) rounded down. If the remaining HP of the foe is 1, this move fails. Ignore the foe's Defenses.
description: The Pokémon jumps at the foe to crush it with an awful bite.

name: Supersonic
effect: Confuse the foe.
description: The Pokémon emits a series of ultrasonic waves that make the foe dizzy and disoriented.

name: Swagger
effect: Increase the foe's Strength by 2. Inflicts Confusion.
description: The Pokémon enrages the for with its arrogant demeanor, making it lose focus in battle.

name: Swallow
effect: Must have used the move "Stockpile" prior to this Move, otherwise it will fail. User restores 2 Health points. Loses the effects of stockpile. The Pokémon must rest an hour before using Swallow again.
description: The Pokémon swallows the energy it was storing to restore some damage, it recovers its normal size afterwards.

name: Sweet Scent
effect: Reduce the foe's Evasion. Attracts wild Pokémon.
description: The Pokémon releases an aroma that its enemies will love.

name: Swift
effect: Never Fail.
description: The user shoots a shar shaped light beam that hits the target at blinding speed.

name: Swords Dance
effect: Increase the User's Strength.
description: The Pokémon makes a dance that raises its battle spirit.

name: Tackle
description: A basic attack that consists of charging at an enemy.

name: Tail Slap
effect: Successive Actions.
description: The Pokémon slaps the foe's face with its strong tail.

name: Tail Whip
effect: Reduce the foe's Defense.
description: The Pokémon moves its tail in such a cute way that the foe will easily let its guard down.

name: Take Down
effect: Recoil.
description: The Pokémon recklessly grapples the foe to smash it on the ground.

name: Tearful Look
effect: Reduce Foe's Strength and Special.
description: The Pokémon's eyes start watering as if it were about to cry, it's foe is moved by the tears and loses its will to fight.

name: Teeter Dance
effect: Inflicts Confusion.
description: The user starts dancing around with wobbly movements. Friends and foes will get dizzy by trying to follow it.

name: Thrash
effect: Rampage.
description: The Pokémon rampages and starts to attack and destroy everything on its path.

name: Tickle
effect: Reduce the foe's Strength and Defense.
description: The Pokémon tickles the foe. The laughter really disturbs the foe's fighting stance.

name: Transform
effect: The user transforms into a copy of the its target with same Ability Attributes, Trait Modifiers and Moves. Being inside a Pokéball breaks the Transformation.
description: The user modifies its own DNA structure to become an identical clone of any Pokémon or object it can see.

name: Tri Attack
effect: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Burn the foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Freeze the Foe.
description: The user shoots three beams. Each one is charged with a different kind of energy.

name: Trump Card
effect: If User's Will is half spent add 1 Dice to the Damage Roll, if the User's Will is depleted add +8 to the Damage Pool.
description: The more exhausted the user is, the stronger this attack will become. When the Pokémon is at the last of its strength this move can be devastating.

name: Uproar
effect: For the rest of the Round, no Pokémon can fall asleep. if a Pokémon was asleep it wakes up.
description: The Pokémon shouts and screams and squeaks so hard the noise really hurts the ears. Nobody could get a full night of sleep with all that ruckus.

name: Vice Grip
description: The Pokémon traps the foe with its pincers or jaws and applies pressure that will leave a nasty bruise.

name: Weather Ball
effect: If the battlefield is under a Weather, add +2 to the Damage Roll and change the Type of the Move accordingly: Sun-Fire, Rainwater, Hail-Ice, Sandstorm-Rock.
description: The user creates a ball of energy that will use the climate around it to grow in size and power.

name: Whirlwind
effect: Low Priority 6. In the wild the battle ends. In an official fight, the Pokémon switches out. if it's the last or only Pokémon the move fails. Switcher Move.
description: The Pokémon creates a powerful wind current that swirls the enemy around and sends it flying away.

name: Wish
effect: At the beginning of its next Round, this Move may become a Basic Heal. Some wishes may be granted.
description: The Pokémon makes a wish with all its might and somehow it becomes true.

name: Work Up
effect: Increase the User's Strength and Special.
description: The Pokémon exercises with vigor to be physically and mentally prepared for battle.

name: Wrap
effect: Blocks. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The Pokémon traps its foe with its body or vines, causing some damage.

name: Wring Out
effect: Remove 1 Duce from the Damage Roll for every missing HP of the Target, leaving a minimum of +1.
description: The Pokémon literally squeezes the life out of its target, as life is fading, squeezing will be harder.

name: Yawn
effect: If the target is not removed from battle by the start of its next Round, it will asleep.
description: The user lets out an infectious yawn that will make anyone drowsy enough to fall asleep pretty soon.

name: Acid
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce Sp. Defense of those affected.
description: The Pokémon showers its foes with a corrosive acid, the burning sensation may leave an opening for other attacks.

name: Acid Armor
effect: Increase the User's Defense.
description: A liquid acid substance seeps through this Pokémon's body turning it into a liquid-like state. The acid deters foes from touching this Pokémon at full force.

name: Acid Spray
effect: Reduce the foe's Special by 2.
description: The user spits a corrosive substance, the burning sensation doesn't allow it to focus on attacking.

name: Baneful Bunker
effect: Priority 4. Shield. If the foe attacked using a Physical Move, it is now Poisoned. Reduce 3 Dice from the Foe's Damage Pool.
description: The user encloses itself inside its sturdy shell, which is covered by poisonous barbs, if a barb pinches the foe's skin the wound will start to fester.

name: Belch
effect: The user must eat something before using this Move.
description: The user lets out a horrible belch on the target. The air contains toxins that deal terrible damage.

name: Clear Smog
effect: Never Fail. Reset all Increased or Reduced Attributes and Traits of the foe.
description: The user sucks all gases to clear away all impurities. The target is left feeling hurt, but light headed.

name: Coil
effect: Increase the User's Strength, Defense, and Accuracy.
description: The Pokémon curls up its body. In a calm but menacing position it prepares to deliver its strike.

name: Cross Poison
effect: High Critical. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Poison the foe.
description: The Pokémon drenches poison into its pincers to slash the enemy in a brutal way.

name: Gastro Acid
effect: Until the end of the Scene, eliminate any effect the foe's Ability would do.
description: The user spits some of its own gastric juices, the acid prevents the foe from using its special abilities.

name: Gunk Shot
effect: Ranged. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.
description: The Pokémon shoots a stream of corrosive sludge made with the most toxic substances it can produce. Just inhaling the scent can make you feel very sick.

name: Poison Fang
effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Badly Poison the Foe.
description: The Pokémon bits the foe and injects its poison directly through its fangs. After that it just waits for the poison to slowly take care of its foe.

name: Poison Gas
effect: Poison those affected.
description: The Pokémon releases a big cloud of toxic gas. Anyone who takes a breath, will start coughing violently. They should seek a doctor immediately.

name: Poison Jab
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.
description: The Pokémon stabs its foe with a stinger or tentacle drenched with venom.

name: Poison Powder
effect: Poison the Foe.
description: The user scatters a small cloud of venomous dust that immediately causes coughing and fever.

name: Poison Sting
effect: Ranged. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Target.
description: The user shoots a small stinger that injects venom into the foe.

name: Poison Tail
effect: High Critical. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.
description: The tail of this Pokémon is sharp like a blade, it attacks with slashing movements and may release some poison through it.

name: Purify
effect: Heal a Target's Status Ailment, the user may heal 1 HP.
description: The Pokémon is covered by a gelatinous goo that can be used to treat several ailments, the Pokémon also uses it as a source of nourishment.

name: Sludge
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.
description: The foe is covered with a disgusting sludge, the fumes and toxins on it can make anyone feel sick.

name: Sludge Bomb
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.
description: The user hurls a ball of toxic sludge that explodes on contact and covers the target.

name: Sludge Wave
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Poison those affected.
description: The Pokémon creates a large wave of watery ooze that soaks everything around. The smell is really unpleasant.

name: Smog
effect: Roll 4 Chance Dice Poison the Foe.
description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases.

name: Toxic
effect: Badly Poison the Foe.
description: With a disgusting diet and training, the user learns how to turn its fluids into a deadly toxin.

name: Toxic Spikes
effect: Foe Pokémon that enter the battlefield become Poisoned. Roll 1 Chance Dice for the Poison to become Badly Poisoned instead. Entry Hazard.
description: The user lays a trap of scattered poison spikes that attach to the opponent's feet leaving them with a bad case of fever.

name: Toxic Thread
effect: Reduce Foe's Dexterity. Poison the Foe.
description: The user shoots a sticky thread that entangles around the foe. The thread is also laced with a potent toxin that will poison the foe on contact.

name: Venom Drench
effect: If an affected foe is poisoned or becomes poisoned in the same Round you used this Move, Reduce its Strength, Special and Dexterity.
description: Foes are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid that targets their weakened immune systems.

name: Venoshock
effect: If the Foe is already poisoned, add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
description: The Pokémon shoots a special kind of toxin that reacts violently if the foe is already weakened with poison.

name: Agility
effect: Increase the User's Dexterity by 2.
description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster.

name: Ally Switch
effect: User switches back. Choose another Pokémon to take its place. It will be ready to fight on the next Round. Switcher Move.
description: The user teleports, switching its place with someone.

name: Amnesia
effect: Increase the User's Sp. Defense by 2.
description: As a fine example of mind over matter, the user temporarily empties its mind to make it more resilient.

name: Barrier
effect: Increase the User's Defense by 2.
description: The user cats a protective field around itself.

name: Calm Mind
effect: Increase the User's Special and Sp. Defense.
description: The user quietly calms its spirit to strengthen its mind and body.

name: Confusion
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.
description: The target's mind is hit by a weak psychic force that leaves them wondering if they were hit by an invisible enemy. Sometimes the foe is left seeing things that aren't really there.

name: Cosmic Power
effect: Increase the User's Defense and Sp. Defense.
description: The user absorbs power from space. This Pokémon glows faintly with energy afterwards.

name: Dream Eater
effect: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down. The target must be asleep, this move will fail otherwise.
description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. When the foe wakes up, it will feel weak and empty.

name: Extrasensory
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
description: The user attacks with an odd, almost invisible power.

name: Future Sight
effect: Strikes at the end of the next Round. It bypasses any Shield Move and cover. If the target retires or switches out from battle, the damage will be dealt to the next opponent or to one of its allies.
description: The Pokémon foresees something terrible happening to the target. It may see images from its own future without any risk.

name: Gravity
effect: Flying and Levitating Pokémon can be hit by Ground Type Moves. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The gravity is intensified, bringing everyone to their knees. Flying Pokémon are slammed to the ground.

name: Guard Split
effect: Average your Defense and Sp. Defense with your target.
description: The user employs its psychic power to average its resilience with the foe. They both feel like they're equals in terms of toughness.

name: Guard Swap
effect: Switch your Defense and Sp. Defense with your foe.
description: The Pokémon employs its psychic power to make the opponent feel like its got your frailty and make the user feel like it got the target's resilience.

name: Heal Block
effect: No one can regain any lost HP. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The user forces everyone's wounds to stay open by using its immense psychic power.

name: Heal Pulse
effect: Basic Heal.
description: The user emits a pulse of energy that heals the wounds of its allies.

name: Healing Wish
effect: The User faints. One Ally is completely healed from all damage and status ailments.
description: THe power of ultimate love and sacrifice. The user wishes to completely heal all injuries, diseases and ailments to save someone's life at the cost of one's own health.

name: Heart Stamp
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
description: The move controls the emotions of the target, making it feel loved and safe. They may strike immediately.

name: Heart Swap
effect: Switch any Trait Increase/Decrease with the target.
description: The user and the target swap their feelings of power and weakness, insecurity and courage, love and hate. Boosts are also swapped.

name: Hypnosis
effect: Put the target to sleep. Dark-Type Pokémon are not immune to this move.
description: Employ a hypnotic suggestion to make the target feel drowsy and fall into a deep slumber. Works better on a target that is not is danger.

name: Imprison
effect: The foe cannot use any Moves known by the User. Lasts for a day.
description: This moves blocks specific parts of the memory the user is well aware of. Be it moves, techniques, names, places, people or situations. The target won't be able to recall those memories.

name: Instruct
effect: Selected Target repeats their last move used this Round, taking the successes on the Accuracy Roll of "Instruct" as if they were for their move. Target must have previously used a successful move during the Round, other "Instruct" will fail.
description: The Pokémon sends a psychic command to one of its allies or foes to enable them to repeat their last action.

name: Kinesis
effect: Lower the foe's Accuracy.
description: A basic psychic power to exert force on objects. You can touch, move, press and affect simple objects to create distractions.

name: Light Screen
effect: User and Allies will receive 1 less Damage from Special Attacks. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The user manifests its mental power on the world, creating walls and floors of light that help prevent the passing of energies.

name: Magic Coat
effect: Priority 4. Redirect the effects of a Support Move that would affect the user or its side of the battlefield towards the foe's (ie. The foe used Stealth Rock, with Magic Coat it will now affect the foe's side instead of yours).
description: The user quickly creates a barrier that reflects any minor attack, status condition, or dirty trick the foe might have wanted to use.

name: Magic Room
effect: No one can use their Held Item nor any other Item. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: Inside the effects of Magic Room, technology, tools and items that require manual use do not work. Automated technology will func

name: Meditate
effect: Increase the User's Strength.
description: The Pokémon meditates to unleash a power that's been sleeping deep inside other user.

name: Miracle Eye
effect: The User may hit Dark Type Pokémon with Psychic Moves. The Pokémon ignores Evasion modifiers. Opponents can't reduce the User's Accuracy.
description: The user's sight transcends the flesh and can look directly into the innermost mental presence of the everyone around. Hidden enemies can be detected.

name: Mirror Coat
effect: The move only works if the foe just used a Special Attack. Roll the same Damage Pool as your foe's last attack and add 2 Extra Damage Dice.
description: The user canalizes the damage received by energies and bounces them back to their source.

name: Power Split
effect: Average the User's Strength and Special with the target.
description: The user employs its psychic power to average its capabilities with the foe. They both feel like they're equals in terms of strength.

name: Power Swap
effect: Switch your Strength and Special with your foe.
description: The Pokémon employs its psychic power to make the opponent feel like it's got your weaknesses and make the user feel like it's got the target's strength.

name: Power Trick
effect: Switch the User's Strength with its Defense and the User's Special with its Sp. Defense.
description: The user's mind is tricked into thinking that strength comes from their vitality, and their vitality is their power.

name: Psybeam
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.
description: Attack with a beam of psychic energy that hits the mind of the target.

name: Psychic
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense.
description: The user's telekinetic force is enough to cause severe harm to their target. This telekinesis is not subtle.

name: Psychic Fangs
effect: If a Barrier is in place on the foe's side (ie. Light Screen, Reflect) destroy it.
description: The Pokémon bares its fangs to bite the foe, psychic energy begins piercing before the actual fangs make contact.

name: Psychic Terrain
effect: For the next 4 Rounds, all Psychic Attacks will deal 1 Extra Dice of Damage. No Pokémon on the ground can use moves with increased Priority.
description: The arena becomes radiated by psychic waves. Everyone begins to think slowly due to the buzz in their heads, making all tasks take more time.

name: Psycho Cut
effect: High Critical.
description: Creates blades of psychic energy to tear down foes.

name: Psycho Shift
effect: Transfer the User's Status Ailments to the target. The user is now cured.
description: With psychic suggestion, the target feels afflicted by the same status problems as the user.

name: Psyshock
effect: Deals Physical Damage.
description: Materialize a psychic wave that pushes the target with real physical force.

name: Psywave
effect: Add 1 Dice of Damage for every 10 levels of the User (ie. The damage pool of a level 43 Pokémon is 4 Dice). Ignore Foe's Defenses.
description: Releases the inner power of the mind to emanate psychic waves that hurt the target.

name: Reflect
effect: User and Allies will receive 1 less Damage from Physical Attacks. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The user manifests its mental power on the world, creating invisible walls and floors that prevent the passing of objects.

name: Rest
effect: Complete Heal. The User ust Sleep for 2 whole Rounds (from Round Start to Round End).
description: The user falls asleep. During this period the body benefits from a super accelerated healing process.

name: Role Play
effect: Copy the target's Ability. The abilities Flower Gift, Illusion, Imposter, Stance Change, Wonder Guard, and Plot Device cannot be copied.
description: The user mimics the target and takes on the most basic features from that character.

name: Skill Swap
effect: Switch Abilities with the foe. The abilities Flower Gift, Illusion, Imposter, Stance Change, Wonder Guard and Plot Device cannot be switched.
description: The user swaps its identity with the target, making both feel like they are from each other's species.

name: Speed Swap
effect: Switch your Dexterity with your Foe.
description: The Pokémon employs its psychic power to make the opponent perceive events as if they were happening faster or slower according to the user's own speed.

name: Stored Power
effect: Add 1 Extra Dice of Damage for each Increased trat the user has (ie. Clefairy has 1 Increased Point in Defense and 1 Evasion, Stored Power will have 2 Extra Dice on the Damage Pool). Up to 7 Dice may be added.
description: This move allows the user to release its power. If the user has any boosts, the damage is increased.

name: Synchronoise
effect: Sound Based. Choose a Type (Fire, Poison, Steel, etc.) this move only affects those with that Type.
description: The user vibrates with any particular energy Type he chooses. All nearby creatures and objects of that Type are hurt.

name: Telekinesis
effect: All attacks against the target have "Never Fail". The target is immune to Ground Moves. Lasts 2 Rounds.
description: The user can manipulate objects and creatures with his mind. Pokémon and humans become easier to hit because their movements are restrained.

name: Teleport
effect: In the wild, the battle ends. In official battles, it counts as the Pokémon being recalled. Teleportation distances depend on Special and Storyteller's discretion.
description: Teleport the user and one more creature to a place of tranquility and high psychic resonance such as Pokémon Centers. Ceilings and walls block this move from working.

name: Trick
effect: The foe and the user swap Held Items.
description: Control the target's mind to perform a simple non-hostile action, such as walking or handing an item.

name: Trick Room
effect: Invert the order of Initiative. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: This reality altering move can manipulate time, so slow creatures are fast and fast creatures are slow.

name: Wonder Room
effect: Defense and Sp. Defense will be calculated with Insight instead of Vitality. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: Inside the Wonder Room, a strong mind makes a strong body and a resilient body makes a resilient mind. However, if the mind is weak, the body will be weak and vice versa.

name: Zen Headbutt
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
description: The user focuses its will on its head to strike with a headbutt.

name: Accelerock
effect: Priority.
description: The Pokémon dashes at great speed using the rocks on its body to strike its foe upon impact.

name: Ancient Power
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Strength, Dexterity, Special, Defense, and Sp. Defense.
description: The Pokémon calls upon an energy from ancient times that strikes the foe and may infuse the user with a primal strength.

name: Head Smash
effect: Recoil.
description: The user charges head first to attack the foe, the strike is devastating for both.

name: Power Gem
description: The user attacks with a ray of light that comes out of the gem.

name: Rock Blast
effect: Ranged. Successive Actions.
description: The Pokémon shoots and throws small rock pebbles that burst into tiny pieces as they touch the foe.

name: Rock Polish
effect: Increase User's Dexterity by 2.
description: The user polishes the rough ends of its rock body for easier and faster movement.

name: Rock Slide
effect: Ranged. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch those affected.
description: The Pokémon creates a slide of falling rocks against its foes that may leave them crushed below the rubble.

name: Rock Throw
effect: Ranged.
description: The user picks up a rock or pebble and throws it at the foe.

name: Rock Tomb
effect: Ranged. Reduce Foe's Dexterity.
description: The Pokémon covers the foe in gravel and rocks, leaving it unable to move freely.

name: Rock Wrecker
effect: Ranged. Must Recharge. Lethal.
description: The user shoots a huge boulder as if it were a cannon ball that can even go through thick walls. This, however, requires a lot of energy from the user.

name: Rollout
effect: Successive Actions. Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Roll of the last Rollout hit the user performs. If the Pokémon used Defense Curl this Round, add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Roll of every hit.
description: The user curls up into a ball and starts rolling towards its foe, trampling everything in its way.

name: Sandstorm
effect: Sandstorm Weather is activated for the next 4 Rounds.
description: The Pokémon casts a fierce wind that carries millions of rough sand particles.

name: Smack Down
effect: Ranged. Remove the foe's Immunity to Ground-Type Attacks.
description: The user hurls a projectile, usually a heavy rock that sends the foe down to the ground, leaving it unable to take off the ground afterwards.

name: Stealth Rock
effect: Entry Hazard. Foe Pokémon that enter the battlefield lose 1 HP, this effect does not stack.
description: The Pokémon hides sharp and pointy rocks all over the foe's side of the battlefield.

name: Stone Edge
effect: Ranged. High Critical. Lethal.
description: The user hurls sharp stones at the foe. The speed and weight of the stones deals a severe amount of damage.

name: Wide Guard
effect: Priority 3. Shield. Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage Pool.
description: The Pokémon uses its whole body to provide coverage and protection to its allies against an incoming attack.

name: Anchor Shot
effect: Ranged. Blocks.
description: The Pokémon hurls an anchor towards its foe and entangles it with seaweed, the anchor drags the foe down so it cannot escape.

name: Autotomize
effect: Increase the User's Dexterity by 2. User's weight is halved for the rest of Scene.
description: The Pokémon sheds pieces and starts rotating other parts of its body for easier and lighter movement.

name: Bullet Punch
effect: Fist Based. Priority.
description: The user launches itself against the foe to strike it with an iron fist.

name: Flash Cannon
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense.
description: The Pokémon absorbs the reflecting light on its body, releasing a powerful beam against the foe.

name: Gear Grind
effect: Double Action.
description: The user traps the foe between its gears and crushes it with two painful grinds.

name: Gear Up
effect: Increase the Strength and Special of one Steel-Type or Electric-Type Ally.
description: The user engages its gears on an ally to leave the ally's body working like a well-oiled machine.

name: Gyro Ball
effect: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage pool for every point of Dexterity the Foe has that surpasses the user's. Up to 5 Dice may be added this way.
description: THe user curls up in a ball and spins against the target at a high speed.

name: Heavy Slam
effect: Add 1 Extra Dice for every 50 kgs. of weight above the target's weight, up to +4 Extra Dice.
description: The user slams the foe using its whole body weight. Smaller foes will be deeply affected.

name: Iron Defense
effect: Increase the User's Defense.
description: The Pokémon hardens its body surface as if it was made from the strongest iron around.

name: Iron Head
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.
description: The Pokémon charges at the foe with a brutal headbutt that may leave the target knocked down on the ground.

name: Iron Tail
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Defense.
description: The user hits the foe with its hardened tail. The target is left vulnerable against subsequent attacks.

name: King's Shield
effect: Priority 3. Shield. If the foe was using a Physical Move, Reduce the foe's Strength by 2. Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage.
description: The Pokémon uses a ghostly shield to protect itself. If the foe managed to touch it, the user will drain some of its lifeforce.

name: Magnet Bomb
effect: Never Fail.
description: The Pokémon hurls a metal bomb that is attracted to the target like a magnet. The moment it touches the foe, it will explode.

name: Metal Burst
effect: This Move only works if the foe just used an attack. Roll the same Damage Pool as your foe's last attack and add 2 Extra Damage Dice.
description: After receiving damage, the user bursts the tiny but sharp metal pieces that came loose because of the foe's attack. The greater the impact the more metal it will shoot.

name: Metal Claw
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Increase the user's Strength.
description: The Pokémon attacks using its sharp claws, the friction may leave them even sharper.

name: Metal Sound
effect: Sound Based. Reduce the foe's Special Defense by 2.
description: The user produces a horrible noise that impedes the foe from focusing on the fight, leaving it vulnerable to attacks.

name: Meteor Mash
effect: Fist Based. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Strength.
description: The user charges with a strong fist and strikes like a meteor.

name: Mirror Shot
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.
description: The user dazes the foe with a beam of light. Those who have experienced it describe it as: "Being in a mirror labyrinth"

name: Shift Gear
effect: Increase the User's Strength and Dexterity.
description: The Pokémon has its gears rotate quickly. Working like a powerful machine.

name: Smart Strike
effect: Lethal. Never Fail.
description: The user stabs the foe using one of its sharp horns with astounding precision. The resulting wound will be very deep and must be treated immediately.

name: Steel Wing
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Defense.
description: The Pokémon uses its sharp feathers as if they were razors.

name: Aqua Jet
effect: Priority.
description: The user propels itself with a blast of water and strikes at high speed.

name: Aqua Ring
effect: At the end of each Round, recover 1 HP. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The user coats itself in a special flowing water that lessens the pain.

name: Aqua Tail
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
description: The user swings its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

name: Brine
effect: If the foe is at half HP or less, add 3 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
description: The user blast the foe with extremely dense water, if the target is tired he may be swept away easily by the pressure.

name: Bubble
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Dexterity.
description: A spray of bubbles flies around the enemies, some of the bubbles stick to their bodies hindering their movement.

name: Bubble Beam
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Dexterity.
description: A long stream of bubbles hits the foe, the bubble foam may prevent the target from moving freely.

name: Clamp
effect: Block. Deal 2 Dice of Damage at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The user traps and crushes the opponent using its thick and sturdy shell.

name: Crabhammer
effect: High Critical.
description: A large pincer strikes with the power of a hammer. The demolition power is incredible.

name: Dive
effect: Charge Move. While charging this move, the User will be out of range. Allows the Pokémon to swim into Deep Waters.
description: The user submerges into the water and continues diving at an insane speed.

name: Hydro Cannon
effect: Must Recharge.
description: The Pokémon blasts the foe with a water surge that could bring down a house. The user needs to rest afterwards.

name: Hydro Pump
description: The user builds up pressure inside its body and then releases a tremendous amount of water at the target.

name: Liquidation
effect: Lethal. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Reduce the Foe's Defense.
description: The Pokémon gets close to its foe then strikes while bursting a full-force blast of pressurized water, the water may cut or dent through the foe's armor.

name: Muddy Water
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce the Accuracy of those affected.
description: The user fills its mouth with dirt and spits a torrent of mud at the foes. This mud may get in the eyes of the enemies.

name: Octazooka
effect: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Accuracy.
description: The user sprays ink at the target's face to obstruct its vision.

name: Rain Dance
effect: Rain Weather is activated for the next 4 Rounds.
description: The user performs a curious mystic dance that summons a heavy rainfall.

name: Razor Shell
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Defense.
description: The Pokémon uses its sharp shell as a weapon to cut the target's fur, armor or anything protecting its body.

name: Scald
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Burn the foe.
description: The user shoots a torrent boiling water, it may leave the foe covered with burns.

name: Soak
effect: Change the target's Type to Water.
description: The user shoots a stream of water and moisture that clings to the foe's body as an overcoat.

name: Sparkling Aria
effect: If an affected Pokémon had any of the Burn Status Conditions, heal it instead of dealing damage.
description: The Pokémon sings a beautiful melody, the song comes out as a sparkling fountain, bursting upon impact and quenching any fire on its path.

name: Surf
description: A giant wave of water sweeps the area while the user swims on top of it.

name: Water Gun
description: The user learns to shoot water with enough force to hurt the foe.

name: Water Pledge
effect: Creates a rainbow that adds 2 Dice to all Chance Dice rolls. This effect lasts 4 turns.
description: The Pokémon chants to invoke the power of Water. Moisture in the air bends the light to create an inspiring rainbow. Everyone in the field is sure to give its best.

name: Water Pulse
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.
description: The Pokémon attacks with a pulsing blast of water, this leaves the foe feeling dizzy.

name: Water Shuriken
effect: Ranged. Priority. Successive Actions.
description: The Pokémon quickly throws sharp jets of water in the shape of a shuriken.

name: Water Sport
effect: For the next 4 Rounds Fire Type attacks won't add their Power to the Damage Pool.
description: The user soaks the battlefield with moisture, making it harder for fire attacks to ignite.

name: Water Spout
effect: Remove 1 Dice of Damage for every missing HP of the User. Up to 5 Dice may be reduced this way.
description: The Pokémon builds up an amazing pressure and releases a huge columnar vortex of water that could even reach the clouds.

name: Waterfall
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
description: The Pokémon may swim with such strength that it may even swim upwards in a waterfall.

name: Whirlpool
effect: Block. Deal 2 dice of damage at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: Trap the foe inside a violent swirling whirlpool that makes the foe unable to escape the battle.

name: Withdraw
effect: Increase User's Defense by 1.
description: The user hides inside its hard shell to protect itself from incoming attacks.

name: Strike
effect: Usable by both Humans and Pokemon.
description: A basic punch, kick, or headbutt.

name: Knockdown
effect: Usable by both Humans and Pokemon. Push the target away from the User. The foe falls prone. It must spend an action if it wants to get back up, but is still able to attack from the prone position with penalties.
description: An attempt to knock a foe flat to the ground.

name: Grapple
effect: Usable by both Humans and Pokemon. The foe cannot move away from the battle, but it can attack. The foe breaks free if it has more Strength or Dexterity than the User.
description: An attempt to grab and hold a foe.

name: Ambush
effect: Usable by both Humans and Pokemon. The user rolls against an unsuspecting foe's Insight + Survival + Alert. If the user wins the roll, it gets a free action against it.
description: An attempt to sneak up on a foe.

name: Cover an Ally
effect: Usable by both Humans and Pokemon. The user is more likely to get attacked than the target ally. It may provide Cover against ranged attacks according to the size of the User. See p44.
description: An attempt to get between an ally and a foes attack.

name: Stabilize an Ally
effect: The User applies CPR and/or first aid to an unconscious Ally. It won't receive Lethal Damage each hour anymore.
description: An attempt to apply basic first aid to a wounded ally.
